RaphaelBeast of Leicester.name: Raphael
RaphaelBeast of Leicester.title: Beast of Leicester
RaphaelBeast of Leicester.description: A student of the Golden Deer House whose stomach matches his large physique. He is not one to neglect to train his muscles. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

AlfonseOpening Miracle.name: Alfonse
AlfonseOpening Miracle.title: Opening Miracle
AlfonseOpening Miracle.description: A kind and serious prince of Askr who is eager to maintain peace. He fights to save the world with power entrusted to him by Askr, the god of openness.

LorenzRed-Rose Noble.name: Lorenz
LorenzRed-Rose Noble.title: Red-Rose Noble
LorenzRed-Rose Noble.description: A student of the Golden Deer House who stands out as the arrogant heir to a well-known noble house. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

IgnatzWorldly Artist.name: Ignatz
IgnatzWorldly Artist.title: Worldly Artist
IgnatzWorldly Artist.description: A student of the Golden Deer House who was raised in a merchant family. As their second son, he was enrolled in the Officers Academy. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

LysitheaDuality Prodigy.name: Lysithea
LysitheaDuality Prodigy.title: Duality Prodigy
LysitheaDuality Prodigy.description: Daughter of Count Ordelia and noble of the Leicester Alliance. With two Crests residing within her, she challenges the very principles of the universe. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

IkeZealous Inheritors.name: Ike
IkeZealous Inheritors.title: Zealous Inheritors
IkeZealous Inheritors.description: Ike and Roy are youths who look up to their fathers and overcome many hardships with courage in their hearts. They appear in Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance / The Binding Blade.
IkeZealous Inheritors.origin: Path of Radiance + The Binding Blade

LynGlitters of Hope.name: Lyn
LynGlitters of Hope.title: Glitters of Hope
LynGlitters of Hope.description: Lyn and Lucina continue to fight on, never giving up hope, even when forced to deal with harsh conditions. They appear in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade / Awakening.

VanitasHollow God.name: Vanitas
VanitasHollow God.title: Hollow God
VanitasHollow God.description: A young god who rules an alternate Askran Kingdom. She is hostile toward Askr and any who associate with him.

V\u00e1liGod of Vengeance.name: Váli
V\u00e1liGod of Vengeance.title: God of Vengeance
V\u00e1liGod of Vengeance.description: A god of Ásgarðr, the celestial realm, with a vindictive personality. Adores her sister Baldr, swearing an oath to exact vengeance on those who have harmed her.

Alfa\u00f0\u00f6rCelestial King.name: Alfaðör
Alfa\u00f0\u00f6rCelestial King.title: Celestial King
Alfa\u00f0\u00f6rCelestial King.description: King of the gods of Ásgarðr, the celestial realm. He desires to know everything and will sacrifice whatever it takes to obtain this knowledge.

ShezNinja Mercenary.name: Shez
ShezNinja Mercenary.title: Ninja Mercenary
ShezNinja Mercenary.description: A mercenary who has set foot on many a battlefield. Here, he challenges the secret missive scramble as a ninja. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

Hr\u00eddFrigid Ninja.name: Hríd
Hr\u00eddFrigid Ninja.title: Frigid Ninja
Hr\u00eddFrigid Ninja.description: The eldest prince of Nifl, Kingdom of Ice. He's come to the festival dressed in ninja garb for the first time.

ShezCovert Mercenary.name: Shez
ShezCovert Mercenary.title: Covert Mercenary
ShezCovert Mercenary.description: An accomplished mercenary from Fódlan. Here, she takes part in the secret-missive scramble as a ninja. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

YunakaStealthy Imitator.name: Yunaka
YunakaStealthy Imitator.title: Stealthy Imitator
YunakaStealthy Imitator.description: A wandering thief, trained in the art of ninja, who is enjoying the festival by making full use of her stealth and impersonation skills. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

GullveigHidden in Time.name: Gullveig
GullveigHidden in Time.title: Hidden in Time
GullveigHidden in Time.description: Future self, Gullveig, and past self, Kvasir. Two beings, whose destinies do not intersect, have come together.

HeimdallrGod of Foresight.name: Heimdallr
HeimdallrGod of Foresight.title: God of Foresight
HeimdallrGod of Foresight.description: A god of Ásgarðr, the celestial realm. Has an intellectual nature and can foresee the actions of others.

GromellBolt Axe General.name: Gromell
GromellBolt Axe General.title: Bolt Axe General
GromellBolt Axe General.description: A well-known and brave general among the army of Daein. He faced off against Crimea's army at Marhaut Range. Appears in Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance.

ElinciaHearts of Purity.name: Elincia
ElinciaHearts of Purity.title: Hearts of Purity
ElinciaHearts of Purity.description: Princess of Crimea, born and raised hidden from most of the world. Her bond with Lucia is like that of a sister. Appears in Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance.

SorenIsolated Strategist.name: Soren
SorenIsolated Strategist.title: Isolated Strategist
SorenIsolated Strategist.description: Young tactician of the Greil Mercenaries. He has a tendency to disrupt the harmony of others by not mincing words. Appears in Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance.

SharenaBorrowed Divinity.name: Sharena
SharenaBorrowed Divinity.title: Borrowed Divinity
SharenaBorrowed Divinity.description: Sharena, having been granted power through the weapon of another world's Askr. Whether here or there, her love of Askr is ever strong.

BoydIntrepid Warrior.name: Boyd
BoydIntrepid Warrior.title: Intrepid Warrior
BoydIntrepid Warrior.description: Warrior of the Greil Mercenaries. Second of three brothers, he has a boisterous personality. What you see is what you get with him. Appears in Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance.

StefanNo-Man's-Blade.name: Stefan
StefanNo-Man's-Blade.title: No-Man's-Blade
StefanNo-Man's-Blade.description: A Branded swordsman who has the blood of both beorc and laguz. He is a direct descendant of Soan, one of the legendary three heroes. Appears in Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance.

FreyjaParallel Hearts.name: Freyja
FreyjaParallel Hearts.title: Parallel Hearts
FreyjaParallel Hearts.description: Freyja, the queen of Dökkálfheimr, the realm of nightmares, and her past self, Eitr. Together, with parallel heartbeats, they join the harvest festival.

RanulfConsiderate Gaze.name: Ranulf
RanulfConsiderate Gaze.title: Considerate Gaze
RanulfConsiderate Gaze.description: A cat warrior from Gallia, the home of the beast tribe of laguz. He is considerate of others at the harvest festival, acting as Skrimir's assistant. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

SkrimirEchoing Howl.name: Skrimir
SkrimirEchoing Howl.title: Echoing Howl
SkrimirEchoing Howl.description: A member of a laguz tribe and viewed as the heir to Caineghis, Gallia's king. With no prior knowledge of the harvest festival, he's here alongside Ranulf. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

PeonyFruitful Dream.name: Peony
PeonyFruitful Dream.title: Fruitful Dream
PeonyFruitful Dream.description: A ljósálfr from Ljósálfheimr, the realm of dreams. She dreams of blissful abundance alongside mortals at the harvest festival.

Ner\u00feuzDivine Abundance.name: Nerþuz
Ner\u00feuzDivine Abundance.title: Divine Abundance
Ner\u00feuzDivine Abundance.description: A goddess of Vanaheimr, the realm of light. She celebrates the harvest alongside mortals as the goddess of the land.

LynPlains Wind.name: Lyn
LynPlains Wind.title: Plains Wind
LynPlains Wind.description: Disciple of the light goddess Naga. Though she cannot remember her past, she remains firm in her convictions. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade / Shadows.

CorrinOf Fates.name: Corrin
CorrinOf Fates.title: Of Fates
CorrinOf Fates.description: One of the Emblems who were summoned to Elyos. Resides in the Ring of the Crux of Fate. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates / Fire Emblem Engage.

HaitakaPersistent General.name: Haitaka
HaitakaPersistent General.title: Persistent General
HaitakaPersistent General.description: A spearman from Hoshido who built an impenetrable defense while protecting Fort Dragonfall. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

HinokaWarrior of Gusto.name: Hinoka
HinokaWarrior of Gusto.title: Warrior of Gusto
HinokaWarrior of Gusto.description: A princess of Hoshido who is sincere in all she does. She trains day in and day out, standing up against any who threaten her family. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

AshBorrowed Power.name: Ash
AshBorrowed Power.title: Borrowed Power
AshBorrowed Power.description: Ash, having been granted some power from Melíai, who is a version of herself from another world, and whom she fights earnestly to save.

ScarletRebellious Streak.name: Scarlet
ScarletRebellious Streak.title: Rebellious Streak
ScarletRebellious Streak.description: A knight from Cheve who leads a group of resistance fighters against the army of Nohr. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

ShuraRighteous Rebel.name: Shura
ShuraRighteous Rebel.title: Righteous Rebel
ShuraRighteous Rebel.description: Survivor of the ruined nation of Kohga. Now a thief in Nohr, he dreams of rebuilding his homeland. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

RyomaWarrior of Bonds.name: Ryoma
RyomaWarrior of Bonds.title: Warrior of Bonds
RyomaWarrior of Bonds.description: The first prince of Hoshido, who bears the responsibility of his country. He polishes his technique with his family's unity ever at the forefront of his mind. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

ChromPivotal Blow.name: Chrom
ChromPivotal Blow.title: Pivotal Blow
ChromPivotal Blow.description: Prince of the Halidom of Ylisse. He participates in the tournament, not as royalty, but as a lone gladiator. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

MarthMasked Gladiator.name: Marth
MarthMasked Gladiator.title: Masked Gladiator
MarthMasked Gladiator.description: A masked swordsman, referring to themself with the same name as the legendary Hero-King of old. Splendid technique is on display here at the tournament. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

FirDual Warriors.name: Fir
FirDual Warriors.title: Dual Warriors
FirDual Warriors.description: Fir, a girl who earnestly follows the path of the sword, with her mother, Karla, a sword master. Side by side, they battle with stunning grace at the tournament. They appear in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade / The Blazing Blade.
FirDual Warriors.origin: The Binding Blade + The Blazing Blade

OgmaFormer Gladiator.name: Ogma
OgmaFormer Gladiator.title: Former Gladiator
OgmaFormer Gladiator.description: Captain of a group of mercenaries who swore his loyalty to Princess Caeda of Talys. His capabilities are on full display here at the tournament. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

ChulainnLeading Gladiator.name: Chulainn
ChulainnLeading Gladiator.title: Leading Gladiator
ChulainnLeading Gladiator.description: A gladiator who knows nothing of defeat and who has inherited the blood of the crusader Od. He proves he is still no less capable of winning here at the tournament. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

DiamantFortified King.name: Diamant
DiamantFortified King.title: Fortified King
DiamantFortified King.description: Young king of Brodia. Possesses a tenacious heart that stands against adversity without fail. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

BrunoMasked Knight.name: Bruno
BrunoMasked Knight.title: Masked Knight
BrunoMasked Knight.description: A masked knight whose identity and motives are a mystery.

Eik\u00feyrnirResolved to Train.name: Eikþyrnir
Eik\u00feyrnirResolved to Train.title: Resolved to Train
Eik\u00feyrnirResolved to Train.description: A member of Yggdrasill's Healing Hands who answers the call of many, tautening his body with power.

BylethAnchor of Hope.name: Byleth
BylethAnchor of Hope.title: Anchor of Hope
BylethAnchor of Hope.description: A former mercenary, and once a teacher at the Officers Academy. Wields the blade of another world for those who seek peace. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

BaldrRays of Judgment.name: Baldr
BaldrRays of Judgment.title: Rays of Judgment
BaldrRays of Judgment.description: A god of Ásgarðr, the celestial realm. She beams with confidence as she accompanies accused criminals to their judgment.

SharenaHopeful Princess.name: Sharena
SharenaHopeful Princess.title: Hopeful Princess
SharenaHopeful Princess.description: Princess of Askr. Dons the same garb as her mother, Henriette, and swears to bring peace back to the land.

VeronicaRoyal Reception.name: Veronica
VeronicaRoyal Reception.title: Royal Reception
VeronicaRoyal Reception.description: Imperial princess of the Emblian Empire. Hosts a tea party, acting as server, to deepen her ties with Askr, which she once was hostile toward.

IngridCordial Teatime.name: Ingrid
IngridCordial Teatime.title: Cordial Teatime
IngridCordial Teatime.description: Ingrid, daughter of Count Galatea, and Nanna, princess of House Nordion, fill the roles of servers with an air of relaxation. They appear in Fire Emblem: Three Houses / Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.

FinnDevoted Service.name: Finn
FinnDevoted Service.title: Devoted Service
FinnDevoted Service.description: A devoted vassal who serves Leonster's royal family. Trading his trusty lance for a tea set, he puts his skills as server on display. Appears in Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.

FelixSavant's Service.name: Felix
FelixSavant's Service.title: Savant's Service
FelixSavant's Service.description: Heir to House Fraldarius who fearlessly devotes himself to the way of the sword. How will he master his new role as tea-party server? Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

C\u00e9lineBlissful Tea Party.name: Céline
C\u00e9lineBlissful Tea Party.title: Blissful Tea Party
C\u00e9lineBlissful Tea Party.description: Princess of Firene. Serves the ultimate tea that grants deep satisfaction to any who drink it. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

H\u00f6\u00f0rDusk Shadow God.name: Höðr
H\u00f6\u00f0rDusk Shadow God.title: Dusk Shadow God
H\u00f6\u00f0rDusk Shadow God.description: A god of Ásgarðr, the celestial realm, with an introverted nature. Responsible for defending accused criminals at the place of judgment.

BaldrCelestial Sun God.name: Baldr
BaldrCelestial Sun God.title: Celestial Sun God
BaldrCelestial Sun God.description: A god of Ásgarðr, the celestial realm, with a conceited nature. Responsible for accompanying accused criminals to the place of judgment.

DagdarReformed Bandit.name: Dagdar
DagdarReformed Bandit.title: Reformed Bandit
DagdarReformed Bandit.description: A former leader of bandits who hid in Mount Violdrake. He changed his ways after meeting Eyvel and began to fight against the empire. Appears in Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.

Mel\u00edaiWarrior Wanderer.name: Melíai
Mel\u00edaiWarrior Wanderer.title: Warrior Wanderer
Mel\u00edaiWarrior Wanderer.description: A mysterious warrior who attacks Askr. Though she has lost her memories, she has the power to travel between worlds.

HomerTraveling Bard.name: Homer
HomerTraveling Bard.title: Traveling Bard
HomerTraveling Bard.description: A bard who has traveled throughout Thracia, observing an age of war and chaos. It is said that his saga is beloved by many in the generations that follow him. Appears in Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.

LeifSworn to Country.name: Leif
LeifSworn to Country.title: Sworn to Country
LeifSworn to Country.description: Son of Quan, prince of Leonster. He musters warriors to defeat the empire alongside Finn, to whom he owes his life. Appears in Fire Emblem: Thracia 776 / Genealogy of the Holy War.
LeifSworn to Country.origin: Thracia 776 + Genealogy of the Holy War

LinoanLady of Tarrah.name: Linoan
LinoanLady of Tarrah.title: Lady of Tarrah
LinoanLady of Tarrah.description: A noblewoman who inherits her father's last wishes and leads the free city of Tarrah. She is promised in marriage to Arion, prince of Thracia. Appears in Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.

MachyuaBlade of Gales.name: Machyua
MachyuaBlade of Gales.title: Blade of Gales
MachyuaBlade of Gales.description: A member of the Magi, a group who work toward freeing Munster. A native child of Munster, she has strong animosity toward the empire. Appears in Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.

Eik\u00feyrnirFit for Waves.name: Eikþyrnir
Eik\u00feyrnirFit for Waves.title: Fit for Waves
Eik\u00feyrnirFit for Waves.description: A member of Yggdrasill's Healing Hands who prevents injury and illness through physical training. He has chosen Askr's ocean as his next place to train, pushing himself even harder.

HapiEternal Sunlit Pair.name: Hapi
HapiEternal Sunlit Pair.title: Eternal Sunlit Pair
HapiEternal Sunlit Pair.description: Hapi calls forth monsters with her sighs and Constance seeks to rebuild House Nuvelle. Will their bond grow even stronger in a land of perpetual summer? They appear in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

BalthusSummer's Big Bet.name: Balthus
BalthusSummer's Big Bet.title: Summer's Big Bet
BalthusSummer's Big Bet.description: A former noble who loves gambling and alcohol. He feels lucky at Askr's ocean and decides to go for the big win. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

YuriTropical Wolf.name: Yuri
YuriTropical Wolf.title: Tropical Wolf
YuriTropical Wolf.description: The pillar of the Ashen Wolf house. He comes to Askr, unsure about what he sees here, as it is so different from the darkness of Abyss. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

Hei\u00f0r\u00fanPeaceful Horizon.name: Heiðrún
Hei\u00f0r\u00fanPeaceful Horizon.title: Peaceful Horizon
Hei\u00f0r\u00fanPeaceful Horizon.description: A member of Yggdrasill's Healing Hands who heals people with her nectar. She visits Askr's ocean in search of peace, safety, and serenity.

MicaiahOf Dawn.name: Micaiah
MicaiahOf Dawn.title: Of Dawn
MicaiahOf Dawn.description: One of the Emblems who were summoned to Elyos. Resides in the Ring of the Dawn Maiden. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn / Fire Emblem Engage.

CelicaSunlit Priestesses.name: Celica
CelicaSunlit Priestesses.title: Sunlit Priestesses
CelicaSunlit Priestesses.description: Celica, a priestess and follower of Mila, and Serra, a cleric and follower of Elimine, bring their protection to the beach this summer. They appear in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia / Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

LapisForager of the Sea.name: Lapis
LapisForager of the Sea.title: Forager of the Sea
LapisForager of the Sea.description: A warrior of Brodia and retainer to Alcryst, she hunts for food on the beach and in the ocean. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

NinoBurst of Summer.name: Nino
NinoBurst of Summer.title: Burst of Summer
NinoBurst of Summer.description: A young girl and member of the Black Fang, a league of assassins. She brings smiles to the people of Askr, in the midst of the glittering sea. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

PallaSoaring Summer.name: Palla
PallaSoaring Summer.title: Soaring Summer
PallaSoaring Summer.description: Eldest of the three sisters who are pegasus knights of the Macedonian Whitewings. Enjoys Askr's summer to its fullest. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

FogadoSummer of Bliss.name: Fogado
FogadoSummer of Bliss.title: Summer of Bliss
FogadoSummer of Bliss.description: First prince of Solm. He loves the heat, the ocean, the beach, and everyone. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

ExcellusConqueror\u2019s Wile.name: Excellus
ExcellusConqueror\u2019s Wile.title: Conqueror’s Wile
ExcellusConqueror\u2019s Wile.description: A tactician who serves Walhart, the emperor of Valm. Acts superior to others and does not hesitate to make use of and discard them. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

GrimaTyrant of Ruin.name: Grima
GrimaTyrant of Ruin.title: Tyrant of Ruin
GrimaTyrant of Ruin.description: Grima, having consumed Robin. The world, filled with death and destruction, greets its end. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

TharjaGloomy Mage.name: Tharja
TharjaGloomy Mage.title: Gloomy Mage
TharjaGloomy Mage.description: A dark mage who spends her days researching strange charms. Her usual gloominess is contrary to her secret passion. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

NoireOf Two Minds.name: Noire
NoireOf Two Minds.title: Of Two Minds
NoireOf Two Minds.description: Daughter of Tharja. Timid and pessimistic, but turns into a totally different person when enraged. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

GrimaTyrant of Despair.name: Grima
GrimaTyrant of Despair.title: Tyrant of Despair
GrimaTyrant of Despair.description: Grima, having consumed Robin. The world, filled with death and destruction, greets its end. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

Black KnightMortal Legend.name: Black Knight
Black KnightMortal Legend.title: Mortal Legend
Black KnightMortal Legend.description: A swordsman and general, revered as the strongest of Daein's Four Riders under Mad King Ashnard. It is said he protected the Dawn Maiden, who sought to restore Daein's former prosperity. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

JuliaBrides of Light.name: Julia
JuliaBrides of Light.title: Brides of Light
JuliaBrides of Light.description: Princess of the Grannvale Empire whose veins run strong with the blood of the 12 crusaders. She participates in the festival alongside Ishtar. They appear in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

LanaBenevolent Bride.name: Lana
LanaBenevolent Bride.title: Benevolent Bride
LanaBenevolent Bride.description: A kind cleric and descendant of the crusader Ullr. As one who is loved by all, she decides her own fate. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

SeliphLight's Legacy.name: Seliph
SeliphLight's Legacy.title: Light's Legacy
SeliphLight's Legacy.description: Descendant of the crusader Baldr and praised as the Scion of Light. He was invited to the festival to fill the role of a groom. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

TineDetermined Bride.name: Tine
TineDetermined Bride.title: Determined Bride
TineDetermined Bride.description: A mage and descendant of the crusader Thrud. Swears an oath to be strong and live for both herself and her mother, who suffered great misfortune. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

LarceiBride of Astra.name: Larcei
LarceiBride of Astra.title: Bride of Astra
LarceiBride of Astra.description: A swordswoman and descendant of the crusader Od. She strikes with all her might like lightning. What fated partner will match her fervor? Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

F\u00e1fnirKing of Desolation.name: Fáfnir
F\u00e1fnirKing of Desolation.title: King of Desolation
F\u00e1fnirKing of Desolation.description: King of Niðavellir who rose from his station as a lowly soldier. Remembers nothing of his past.

AlearRed Days Past.name: Alear
AlearRed Days Past.title: Red Days Past
AlearRed Days Past.description: One of the Fell Dragon's countless children. At her father's command, she desires the Emblem Rings. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

AlearFell Dragon Child.name: Alear
AlearFell Dragon Child.title: Fell Dragon Child
AlearFell Dragon Child.description: One of the Fell Dragon Sombron's countless children. Dissociated from his emotions, he acts out his father's orders. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

DedueDauntless Beast.name: Dedue
DedueDauntless Beast.title: Dauntless Beast
DedueDauntless Beast.description: Uses a Crest Stone to transform into a Demonic Beast in battle, repaying his debt to Dimitri, who saved his life. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

LenaBereft Angel.name: Lena
LenaBereft Angel.title: Bereft Angel
LenaBereft Angel.description: A cleric from Macedon whose mind was stolen by Gharnef to be used as a sacrifice in the resurrection of Medeus. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

MarthLove and Courage.name: Marth
MarthLove and Courage.title: Love and Courage
MarthLove and Courage.description: Marth, prince of Altea, and Caeda, princess of Talys. They developed a deep love for one another on the battlefield during both the War of Shadows and the War of Heroes. They appear in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

ElmRetainer to Embla.name: Elm
ElmRetainer to Embla.title: Retainer to Embla
ElmRetainer to Embla.description: Retainer to Embla, god of barriers and broken bonds. Snide and shameless, he lines his words with barbs meant to wound.

XaneFickle Dragon.name: Xane
XaneFickle Dragon.title: Fickle Dragon
XaneFickle Dragon.description: A young, dubious Divine Dragon. Took part in the conflict in which Naga sealed away the Earth Dragons. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

MedeusLast Earth Dragon.name: Medeus
MedeusLast Earth Dragon.title: Last Earth Dragon
MedeusLast Earth Dragon.description: The only Earth Dragon who decided to follow Naga and become a manakete. He guards the Dragon Altar in Dolhr. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

GotohApostle of Naga.name: Gotoh
GotohApostle of Naga.title: Apostle of Naga
GotohApostle of Naga.description: A Divine Dragon in service of Naga's will. He commands magic beyond human comprehension. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

NagaRuler of Dragons.name: Naga
NagaRuler of Dragons.title: Ruler of Dragons
NagaRuler of Dragons.description: Ruler of the Divine Dragons. She sealed the Earth Dragons, who sought to exterminate humanity, deep underground. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem and Fire Emblem Awakening.

TikiDragon's Progeny.name: Tiki
TikiDragon's Progeny.title: Dragon's Progeny
TikiDragon's Progeny.description: The last child born of the Divine Dragons. Bears the fate of living for thousands of years as a manakete. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

CorrinYoung Kinship.name: Corrin
CorrinYoung Kinship.title: Young Kinship
CorrinYoung Kinship.description: Young Heroes blessed with the power of the First Dragons. By order of the king of Nohr, they live apart from their siblings at a fortress in the north. They appear in Fire Emblem Fates.

XanderFocused Firstborn.name: Xander
XanderFocused Firstborn.title: Focused Firstborn
XanderFocused Firstborn.description: First prince of Nohr. He works diligently every day to protect his siblings. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

EliseSparkling Smile.name: Elise
EliseSparkling Smile.title: Sparkling Smile
EliseSparkling Smile.description: Youngest princess of Nohr. She is a kindhearted person, always smiling, who is very considerate of her siblings. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

LeoDark Sprout.name: Leo
LeoDark Sprout.title: Dark Sprout
LeoDark Sprout.description: Youngest prince of Nohr. Exceptionally talented, he is capable of just about anything, particularly magic. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

CamillaYoung Beauty.name: Camilla
CamillaYoung Beauty.title: Young Beauty
CamillaYoung Beauty.description: First princess of Nohr. She cares deeply for her siblings and unleashes a relentless wrath on any who threaten harm to them. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

EirikaOf the Sacred.name: Eirika
EirikaOf the Sacred.title: Of the Sacred
EirikaOf the Sacred.description: One of the Emblems who were summoned to Elyos. Resides in the Ring of the Azure Twins. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones / Fire Emblem Engage.

JedahPriest of Duma.name: Jedah
JedahPriest of Duma.title: Priest of Duma
JedahPriest of Duma.description: The high priest of the Duma Faithful, a group influential in northern Valentia. Has received the protection of the god Duma and boasts arcane power beyond that of normal humans. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

AlmPowerful Resolve.name: Alm
AlmPowerful Resolve.title: Powerful Resolve
AlmPowerful Resolve.description: A young boy from Ram Village with the Brand on his left hand. Fights with resolve, determined to keep his oath he swore to Celica as a child. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

JesseBlithe Mercenary.name: Jesse
JesseBlithe Mercenary.title: Blithe Mercenary
JesseBlithe Mercenary.description: A wandering, fun-loving mercenary who refuses to turn a blind eye to any woman in need. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

NomahPriest of Mila.name: Nomah
NomahPriest of Mila.title: Priest of Mila
NomahPriest of Mila.description: The high priest of the Mila Faithful, a group influential in southern Valentia. Oversees the priory on Novis Island, and raises Celica as his own. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

NuibabaMistress of Fear.name: Nuibaba
NuibabaMistress of Fear.title: Mistress of Fear
NuibabaMistress of Fear.description: An arcanist who serves the Duma Faithful. Trades souls in exchange for a dark spell that brings death. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

MaeSpring Cheer.name: Mae
MaeSpring Cheer.title: Spring Cheer
MaeSpring Cheer.description: A mage who is well liked for her positivity and energy. She is Celica's close friend and strives to bring Askr's spring festival to life. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

EitrSpring Sunrise.name: Eitr
EitrSpring Sunrise.title: Spring Sunrise
EitrSpring Sunrise.description: Unquestioning servant of the ruler of nothingness, she lacks the confidence to express her own will. Yet, at Askr's spring festival, she comes to know of a new world.

PlumeriaSpring Dance.name: Plumeria
PlumeriaSpring Dance.title: Spring Dance
PlumeriaSpring Dance.description: Plumeria, the dökkálfr, and Olivia, the dancer. Their dance brings color to the spring festival. They appear in Fire Emblem Heroes / Awakening

Lon'quSpring Jitters.name: Lon'qu
Lon'quSpring Jitters.title: Spring Jitters
Lon'quSpring Jitters.description: A skilled swordsman of Regna Ferox who is oddly skittish around women. He shows some hesitancy toward Askr's spring festival. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

VeyleSpring Tranquility.name: Veyle
VeyleSpring Tranquility.title: Spring Tranquility
VeyleSpring Tranquility.description: A dragon with a heart as warm as springtime. Her friends picked out her outfit for the festival. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

SakuraIn Full Bloom.name: Sakura
SakuraIn Full Bloom.title: In Full Bloom
SakuraIn Full Bloom.description: Princess of Hoshido who is a gentle healer. She offers a hand to any and all in need. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

GrissIndulging Pain.name: Griss
GrissIndulging Pain.title: Indulging Pain
GrissIndulging Pain.description: Second-in-command of the Four Hounds, he is a dangerous villain filled with madness, more fond of pain than anything else. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

YunakaHidden Mask.name: Yunaka
YunakaHidden Mask.title: Hidden Mask
YunakaHidden Mask.description: A wanderer who travels Elyos. She keeps a tight lid on the details of her past. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

ZelestiaLoving Leader.name: Zelestia
ZelestiaLoving Leader.title: Loving Leader
ZelestiaLoving Leader.description: Leader of the Four Winds. A scion and last survivor of the Mage Dragons, she is rich in love and affection for her companions. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

RafalAtoning Dragon.name: Rafal
RafalAtoning Dragon.title: Atoning Dragon
RafalAtoning Dragon.description: A child of the Fell Dragon from another Elyos. He is Nel's younger brother and very much her counterpart. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

NelStoic Dragon.name: Nel
NelStoic Dragon.title: Stoic Dragon
NelStoic Dragon.description: A child of the Fell Dragon from another Elyos. She is Rafal's elder sister and very much his counterpart. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

RheaAura of Love.name: Rhea
RheaAura of Love.title: Aura of Love
RheaAura of Love.description: Archbishop who guides the Church of Seiros. She bestows love in equal measure unto all who celebrate the festival, including her mother, Sothis, who joins her. They appear in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

HubertCrimson Schemer.name: Hubert
HubertCrimson Schemer.title: Crimson Schemer
HubertCrimson Schemer.description: Loyal to Edelgard and considering himself her counselor, he discerns for her the optimal path to victory, even at the festival. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

EdelgardAdorned Eagle.name: Edelgard
EdelgardAdorned Eagle.title: Adorned Eagle
EdelgardAdorned Eagle.description: Princess and heir apparent of the Adrestian Empire. She exhibits exquisite grace as she embarks on a path of domination, even at the festival. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

DimitriStargazing Lion.name: Dimitri
DimitriStargazing Lion.title: Stargazing Lion
DimitriStargazing Lion.description: Crown prince of the Holy Kingdom of Faerghus. Enjoying the enthusiasm of the festival, he lets loose and throws aside his inhibitions. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

ClaudeDistant Deer.name: Claude
ClaudeDistant Deer.title: Distant Deer
ClaudeDistant Deer.description: Heir to House Riegan, leader of the Leicester Alliance. At times he's like a shadow, other times as vibrant as the sun. But he remains elusive as ever at this year's festival. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

AthosOmniscient One.name: Athos
AthosOmniscient One.title: Omniscient One
AthosOmniscient One.description: One of the Eight Legends who fought in the ancient Scouring. For over one thousand years, he lived and pursued the mysteries of the world. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

AyraSupreme Astra.name: Ayra
AyraSupreme Astra.title: Supreme Astra
AyraSupreme Astra.description: Princess of Isaach, a descendant of the crusader Od, and a master of the sword. She was praised as the sword princess of the technique Astra. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

TethysDancing Sands.name: Tethys
TethysDancing Sands.title: Dancing Sands
TethysDancing Sands.description: An elegant dancer of Gerik's Mercenaries. She dances to entertain the crowd at the festival of her homeland, Jehanna. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

SaberDune Walker.name: Saber
SaberDune Walker.title: Dune Walker
SaberDune Walker.description: A money-hungry mercenary who will take on just about any job if he's paid enough. He makes an appearance at the festival being held in the deserts of Jehanna. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

MarisaWillful Blades.name: Marisa
MarisaWillful Blades.title: Willful Blades
MarisaWillful Blades.description: Marisa, of Gerik's Mercenaries, and Byleth, a former mercenary of Jeralt's band. The two meet for the first time at the Jehanna festival. They appear in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones / Three Houses.

MaliceBlooming Blade.name: Malice
MaliceBlooming Blade.title: Blooming Blade
MaliceBlooming Blade.description: A mercenary who wields a sword as easily as water flows through a stream. She sets her sights on making money at the Jehanna festival. Appears in Fire Emblem: New Mystery of the Emblem.

IkeDesert Mercenary.name: Ike
IkeDesert Mercenary.title: Desert Mercenary
IkeDesert Mercenary.description: Leader of the Greil Mercenaries. He works as security at the festival being held in the deserts of Jehanna. Appears in Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance.

ChulainnUnbeaten Warrior.name: Chulainn
ChulainnUnbeaten Warrior.title: Unbeaten Warrior
ChulainnUnbeaten Warrior.description: A gladiator who wanders the land in search of bounties. It is said he has never seen defeat. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

BrigidAwakened Bow.name: Brigid
BrigidAwakened Bow.title: Awakened Bow
BrigidAwakened Bow.description: Older twin sister of Edain, whom she was separated from when they were small. Brigid's path was harsh until she was awakened to the divine bow, the legacy of her forebears. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

DewBenevolent Thief.name: Dew
DewBenevolent Thief.title: Benevolent Thief
DewBenevolent Thief.description: Was captured for his thievery but allowed to escape with Edain at her request. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

MidirArcher of Yngvi.name: Midir
MidirArcher of Yngvi.title: Archer of Yngvi
MidirArcher of Yngvi.description: An archer knight in service of Yngvi. He was severely injured when he stood up against Munnir's assault. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

EdainLady of Yngvi.name: Edain
EdainLady of Yngvi.title: Lady of Yngvi
EdainLady of Yngvi.description: A lady of Yngvi and descendant of the crusader Ullr. She was captured by Verdane but escaped with Jamke's aid. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

N\u00ed\u00f0h\u00f6ggrDaze of Healing.name: Níðhöggr
N\u00ed\u00f0h\u00f6ggrDaze of Healing.title: Daze of Healing
N\u00ed\u00f0h\u00f6ggrDaze of Healing.description: A member of the Healing Hands of Yggdrasill who heals others with a sweet fruit. She turns up to Askr's New Year celebration already tipsy.

TanaSoaring New Year.name: Tana
TanaSoaring New Year.title: Soaring New Year
TanaSoaring New Year.description: Princess of Frelia, donning a special outfit in celebration of the new year, and joined by her brother, Innes. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

InnesNew Year's Aim.name: Innes
InnesNew Year's Aim.title: New Year's Aim
InnesNew Year's Aim.description: Prince of Frelia and Tana's brother. In an effort to continue to improve upon himself, he begins his training day one of the new year. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

Hr\u00e6svelgrWings of Healing.name: Hræsvelgr
Hr\u00e6svelgrWings of Healing.title: Wings of Healing
Hr\u00e6svelgrWings of Healing.description: A member of the Healings Hands of Yggdrasill. She greets the new year with well-wishes for the health of all people.

Hei\u00f0r\u00fanSisters of Healing.name: Heiðrún
Hei\u00f0r\u00fanSisters of Healing.title: Sisters of Healing
Hei\u00f0r\u00fanSisters of Healing.description: Sisters and members of the Healing Hands of Yggdrasill. They pray for the health of all at Askr's New Year celebration.

LynOf Blazing.name: Lyn
LynOf Blazing.title: Of Blazing
LynOf Blazing.description: One of the Emblems who were summoned to Elyos. Resides in the Ring of the Lady of the Plains. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade / Fire Emblem Engage.

Eik\u00feyrnirBlessed Strength.name: Eikþyrnir
Eik\u00feyrnirBlessed Strength.title: Blessed Strength
Eik\u00feyrnirBlessed Strength.description: A member of Yggdrasill's Healing Hands who, as winter envoy, extends a standing invitation for all to start on a path to physical training.

FomortiisDark of Night.name: Fomortiis
FomortiisDark of Night.title: Dark of Night
FomortiisDark of Night.description: The Demon King who once cast a long shadow over the continent of Magvel. His intention is to adorn Askr's festival night with terror... Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

AlearGifted Dragons.name: Alear
AlearGifted Dragons.title: Gifted Dragons
AlearGifted Dragons.description: Two Divine Dragons who adorn Askr's winter festival. And they are joined by the guardian spirit of the Somniel too. They appear in Fire Emblem Engage.

ShezSnowfield Envoy.name: Shez
ShezSnowfield Envoy.title: Snowfield Envoy
ShezSnowfield Envoy.description: A mercenary who wandered Fódlan alone. Her new mission is assuming the role of winter envoy. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

HortensiaWinter's Dearest.name: Hortensia
HortensiaWinter's Dearest.title: Winter's Dearest
HortensiaWinter's Dearest.description: Second princess of Elusia. She grew up in a country known for its deep snow, therefore is highly knowledgeable about winter festivals. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

VaidaDracofang General.name: Vaida
VaidaDracofang General.title: Dracofang General
VaidaDracofang General.description: Praised as the most powerful Wyvern General of Bern. When she expressed anger toward the corrupt military, she was falsely accused of a crime and expelled from her country. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

LeilaSuperb Shadow.name: Leila
LeilaSuperb Shadow.title: Superb Shadow
LeilaSuperb Shadow.description: A spy who serves House Ostia. She is exceptionally skilled and loyal, and has a romantic relationship with Matthew. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

RuneSource of Wisdom.name: Rune
RuneSource of Wisdom.title: Source of Wisdom
RuneSource of Wisdom.description: A boy who fled from Ásgarðr, the celestial realm. Through his mysterious power he can decipher writings that depict the beginning of creation.

OswinImpregnable Knight.name: Oswin
OswinImpregnable Knight.title: Impregnable Knight
OswinImpregnable Knight.description: An armored knight of Ostia. He accompanies Hector on his journey under the strict orders of Hector's older brother Uther, marquess of Ostia. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

UtherFrugal Militarist.name: Uther
UtherFrugal Militarist.title: Frugal Militarist
UtherFrugal Militarist.description: Marquess Ostia, the head of the Lycian League. Though his body appears strong, he suffers from an incurable disease. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

HectorSteel Warrior.name: Hector
HectorSteel Warrior.title: Steel Warrior
HectorSteel Warrior.description: Brother of Marquess Ostia and rumored to be a little rough around the edges. He dashes to aid his best friend Eliwood whenever he's in danger. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

N\u00ed\u00f0h\u00f6ggrQuieting Dose.name: Níðhöggr
N\u00ed\u00f0h\u00f6ggrQuieting Dose.title: Quieting Dose
N\u00ed\u00f0h\u00f6ggrQuieting Dose.description: A member of Yggdrasill's Healing Hands who prefers to remain intoxicated in order to keep her true feelings from coming to the surface.

L\u00e6ra\u00f0rQuieting Heart.name: Læraðr
L\u00e6ra\u00f0rQuieting Heart.title: Quieting Heart
L\u00e6ra\u00f0rQuieting Heart.description: Leader of the Healing Hands of Yggdrasill. He is known to control people's hearts.

ZeissEbon Bolt.name: Zeiss
ZeissEbon Bolt.title: Ebon Bolt
ZeissEbon Bolt.description: A wyvern rider of Bern. The younger brother of Melady, who is ever by Princess Guinivere's side. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

\u00dejaziRuthless J\u00f6tun.name: Þjazi
\u00dejaziRuthless J\u00f6tun.title: Ruthless Jötun
\u00dejaziRuthless J\u00f6tun.description: The younger sister of the queen of ancient Jötunheimr. She is fierce and merciless, and will not acknowledge dvergr independence.

ElffinTruth Beholden.name: Elffin
ElffinTruth Beholden.title: Truth Beholden
ElffinTruth Beholden.description: A supporter of the resistance fighters in the west, he lives as a mysterious bard. But his true identity is that of Prince Myrddin of Etruria. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

OgierOstia's New Blade.name: Ogier
OgierOstia's New Blade.title: Ostia's New Blade
OgierOstia's New Blade.description: A mercenary hired by House Ostia. Even though his armor is substandard, he holds his head high in battle as a member of the heavy knights. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

BorsOstia's Bastion.name: Bors
BorsOstia's Bastion.title: Ostia's Bastion
BorsOstia's Bastion.description: A heavily armored knight dispatched to escort Lilina. On her request, he agreed to stay with Roy and loyally fight beside him. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

LilinaBrilliant Flame.name: Lilina
LilinaBrilliant Flame.title: Brilliant Flame
LilinaBrilliant Flame.description: Princess of House Ostia, a leader of the Lycian League. She fought through an ocean of chaos while being swept up in the currents of destiny. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

TharjaShadow Ninja.name: Tharja
TharjaShadow Ninja.title: Shadow Ninja
TharjaShadow Ninja.description: This dark mage of Plegia brings her gloom and jealousy to the ninja festival, never letting Robin too far out of her sight. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

NoireDemurely Deft.name: Noire
NoireDemurely Deft.title: Demurely Deft
NoireDemurely Deft.description: Tharja's daughter. Her timid personality can turn on a dime when she is enraged. She joins the ninja festival with her mother and tormentor. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

LucinaShadows of Fate.name: Lucina
LucinaShadows of Fate.title: Shadows of Fate
LucinaShadows of Fate.description: Chrom from the Halidom of Ylisse and his daughter Lucina from the future join us as we honor this parent-child bond at the ninja festival. They appear in Fire Emblem Awakening.

DiamantGallant Ninja.name: Diamant
DiamantGallant Ninja.title: Gallant Ninja
DiamantGallant Ninja.description: The crown prince of Brodia. He works earnestly to become proficient in the art of the ninja. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

C\u00e9lineTeatime Ninja.name: Céline
C\u00e9lineTeatime Ninja.title: Teatime Ninja
C\u00e9lineTeatime Ninja.description: Princess of Firene. She respects the harmony and elegance of flower arranging and tea ceremonies, pondering them with fondness. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Hr\u00e6svelgrQuieting Blade.name: Hræsvelgr
Hr\u00e6svelgrQuieting Blade.title: Quieting Blade
Hr\u00e6svelgrQuieting Blade.description: A member of Yggdrasill's Healing Hands who, though level-headed and stern, loves her family with unwavering devotion.

MetodeyShrewd Braggart.name: Metodey
MetodeyShrewd Braggart.title: Shrewd Braggart
MetodeyShrewd Braggart.description: An arrogant, yet gifted assassin who aids the Flame Emperor. His ambition extends far beyond any morals he may possess. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

DagrSunny Bloom.name: Dagr
DagrSunny Bloom.title: Sunny Bloom
DagrSunny Bloom.description: Princess of Jötunheimr who lost her older sister and is now the next and only heir to the throne.

DorotheaDaring Ex-Singer.name: Dorothea
DorotheaDaring Ex-Singer.title: Daring Ex-Singer
DorotheaDaring Ex-Singer.description: A student of the Black Eagles. She once drew the attention of aristocrats as a songstress. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

CasparHotheaded Inciter.name: Caspar
CasparHotheaded Inciter.title: Hotheaded Inciter
CasparHotheaded Inciter.description: A student of the Black Eagles. He is the second son of Count Bergliez, the Minister of Military Affairs. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

AsheChivalric Amends.name: Ashe
AsheChivalric Amends.title: Chivalric Amends
AsheChivalric Amends.description: A student of the Blue Lions. Though he was born a commoner, by a twist of fate Lord Lonato took him in. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

MarianneCursed Blessing.name: Marianne
MarianneCursed Blessing.title: Cursed Blessing
MarianneCursed Blessing.description: Adopted daughter of Margrave Edmund. She is more optimistic about herself than ever before. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

NagiHopeful Eternity.name: Nagi
NagiHopeful Eternity.title: Hopeful Eternity
NagiHopeful Eternity.description: Nagi, a Divine Dragon with no memories, attends the harvest festival, where Idunn imparts wisdom she has gained by reclaiming her heart and mind. They appear in Fire Emblem: New Mystery of the Emblem / The Binding Blade.
NagiHopeful Eternity.origin: New Mystery of the Emblem + The Binding Blade

YarneTrick or Taguel.name: Yarne
YarneTrick or Taguel.title: Trick or Taguel
YarneTrick or Taguel.description: As last of the taguel, he fears extinction. This year, he dons a costume at the harvest festival. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

NahGrateful One.name: Nah
NahGrateful One.title: Grateful One
NahGrateful One.description: Nowi's daughter. She looks young, but she's very put together, and she expresses her gratitude for the harvest at this year's festival. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

LetheCat Attack.name: Lethe
LetheCat Attack.title: Cat Attack
LetheCat Attack.description: A fierce warrior from Gallia, land of the laguz. She shows her thanks for nature's blessings at the harvest festival. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

AskrOpen Harvest.name: Askr
AskrOpen Harvest.title: Open Harvest
AskrOpen Harvest.description: The god of openness from which the kingdom of Askr's name originates. He enjoys the harvest festival to its fullest.

SigurdOf the Holy War.name: Sigurd
SigurdOf the Holy War.title: Of the Holy War
SigurdOf the Holy War.description: One of the Emblems who were summoned to Elyos. Resides in the Ring of the Holy Knight. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War / Fire Emblem Engage.
SigurdOf the Holy War.origin: Genealogy of the Holy War + Engage

MarniPining for Praise.name: Marni
MarniPining for Praise.title: Pining for Praise
MarniPining for Praise.description: A member of the Four Hounds. Relishes praise most of all and regards herself as superior to others. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

ReginnDvergr Heir.name: Reginn
ReginnDvergr Heir.title: Dvergr Heir
ReginnDvergr Heir.description: Princess and future queen of Niðavellir. She is training so that she may one day find herself worthy of the throne.

PandreoParty Priest.name: Pandreo
PandreoParty Priest.title: Party Priest
PandreoParty Priest.description: A Solm Palace priest and Prince Fogado's retainer. He's deeply religious, but loves a party. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

MerrinSuave Knight.name: Merrin
MerrinSuave Knight.title: Suave Knight
MerrinSuave Knight.description: A knight of Solm and Princess Timerra's retainer. She is a suave woman who cherishes animals. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

FogadoAffable Prince.name: Fogado
FogadoAffable Prince.title: Affable Prince
FogadoAffable Prince.description: First prince of Solm and Timerra's little brother. He is more amiable than one expects of royalty. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

TimerraDesert Warrior.name: Timerra
TimerraDesert Warrior.title: Desert Warrior
TimerraDesert Warrior.description: Crown princess of Solm, the Queendom of Freedom. Bubbly and outgoing, she is known for being accessible and approachable by all. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

FjormGleaming Ice Pair.name: Fjorm
FjormGleaming Ice Pair.title: Gleaming Ice Pair
FjormGleaming Ice Pair.description: Nifl, known as the god of ice, and Princess Fjorm participate in the festival of snow and ice.

TheaWings of Winter.name: Thea
TheaWings of Winter.title: Wings of Winter
TheaWings of Winter.description: A pegasus knight of Ilia. Her new mission is to participate in the festival of snow and ice. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

NilsSnowflake Melody.name: Nils
NilsSnowflake Melody.title: Snowflake Melody
NilsSnowflake Melody.description: A boy who travels with his sister, Ninian. He shows off his talent with the flute at the festival of snow and ice. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

FloraPolar-Perfect.name: Flora
FloraPolar-Perfect.title: Polar-Perfect
FloraPolar-Perfect.description: A calm, composed maid from the Ice Tribe of Nohr. She supports the festival of snow and ice with poise and perfection. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

FeliciaConfidently Cold.name: Felicia
FeliciaConfidently Cold.title: Confidently Cold
FeliciaConfidently Cold.description: A hard-working but clumsy maid from the Ice Tribe of Nohr. She fights eagerly to make the festival of snow and ice a success. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

ShezDual Sword Master.name: Shez
ShezDual Sword Master.title: Dual Sword Master
ShezDual Sword Master.description: Mercenary that throws himself into the battles of Fódlan. Defeated countless foes and led many allies to victory. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

PanetteClassy Brawler.name: Panette
PanetteClassy Brawler.title: Classy Brawler
PanetteClassy Brawler.description: A warrior for Solm and retainer to Timerra. Her speech tends to be stilted, but at times it's erratic. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

RobinExalt's Right Hand.name: Robin
RobinExalt's Right Hand.title: Exalt's Right Hand
RobinExalt's Right Hand.description: Ylisse's tactician and Chrom's other half. She dons new garb and offers her strength to the exalt and the people. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

FelixSword Savant.name: Felix
FelixSword Savant.title: Sword Savant
FelixSword Savant.description: Second son of the Holy Kingdom of Faerghus's House Fraldarius. Pursuing improvement, he will cross blades with any he values as a skilled foe. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

AlfonseHeir to Openness.name: Alfonse
AlfonseHeir to Openness.title: Heir to Openness
AlfonseHeir to Openness.description: A kind and serious prince of Askr. Wearing the same gear his father once wore, he possesses a renewed determination and sense of purpose.

BernadettaSheltered Loner.name: Bernadetta
BernadettaSheltered Loner.title: Sheltered Loner
BernadettaSheltered Loner.description: Daughter of Count Varley, Minister of Religious Affairs to the Adrestian Empire. Overly shy, she prefers to spend her time alone in her room. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

TakumiWishful Spark.name: Takumi
TakumiWishful Spark.title: Wishful Spark
TakumiWishful Spark.description: The second prince of Hoshido has formed a bond with Leo of Nohr and decided to bring him along with him to the summer festival. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

NepheneeFestival Harmony.name: Nephenee
NepheneeFestival Harmony.title: Festival Harmony
NepheneeFestival Harmony.description: Nephenee, a Crimean villager, and Sakura, a Hoshidan princess, overcome barriers of status and celebrate the summer festival together. They appear in Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance / Fates.

MiaSummer Slice.name: Mia
MiaSummer Slice.title: Summer Slice
MiaSummer Slice.description: A polished sword wielder and member of the Greil Mercenaries, Mia dons a yukata at the summer festival. Appears in Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance.

LuciaLoyalty Enrobed.name: Lucia
LuciaLoyalty Enrobed.title: Loyalty Enrobed
LuciaLoyalty Enrobed.description: Lucia is a loyal retainer to Elincia in Crimea. Her work has brought her to the summer festival, wearing an elegant yukata. Appears in Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance.

LeoFestival Bonds.name: Leo
LeoFestival Bonds.title: Festival Bonds
LeoFestival Bonds.description: The second prince of Nohr accompanies Takumi of Hoshido to the summer festival, their bond put on display. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

Eik\u00feyrnirQuieting Strength.name: Eikþyrnir
Eik\u00feyrnirQuieting Strength.title: Quieting Strength
Eik\u00feyrnirQuieting Strength.description: A member of Yggdrasill's Healing Hands who firmly believes that any illness or injury can be resolved through training the body and building strength.

Hei\u00f0r\u00fanHealing Nectar.name: Heiðrún
Hei\u00f0r\u00fanHealing Nectar.title: Healing Nectar
Hei\u00f0r\u00fanHealing Nectar.description: A member of Yggdrasill's Healing Hands. Her nectar is a potent medicine that can heal poison and disease.

GlenSunstone.name: Glen
GlenSunstone.title: Sunstone
GlenSunstone.description: One of Grado's Imperial Three generals, he rides a wyvern and goes by the title of Sunstone. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

Ni\u00f0avellirFounding King.name: Niðavellir
Ni\u00f0avellirFounding King.title: Founding King
Ni\u00f0avellirFounding King.description: The first and founding king of Niðavellir who fought and won independence from the jötnar.

KyleZealous Knight.name: Kyle
KyleZealous Knight.title: Zealous Knight
KyleZealous Knight.description: A knight of Renais who serves Ephraim directly. He is eager and known for his sternness. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

FordeUnfettered Knight.name: Forde
FordeUnfettered Knight.title: Unfettered Knight
FordeUnfettered Knight.description: A knight of Renais in Ephraim's service, he is free-spirited and fickle, even on the battlefield. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

AmeliaBlossoming Talent.name: Amelia
AmeliaBlossoming Talent.title: Blossoming Talent
AmeliaBlossoming Talent.description: A soldier from Silva, a Grado village. She grew strong quickly, training under General Duessel. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

EirikaResolute Princess.name: Eirika
EirikaResolute Princess.title: Resolute Princess
EirikaResolute Princess.description: The princess of Renais, determined to protect her country alongside her twin brother, Ephraim. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

DedueLoyal Life Guard.name: Dedue
DedueLoyal Life Guard.title: Loyal Life Guard
DedueLoyal Life Guard.description: A servant to Dimitri who is loyal to all ends, including along the shores of Askr's ocean. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

PetraFaraway Sun.name: Petra
PetraFaraway Sun.title: Faraway Sun
PetraFaraway Sun.description: From Brigid, in the western reaches of Fódlan, hails this princess who enjoys basking in Askr's summer sun. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

GoldmaryCoy Beach Divas.name: Goldmary
GoldmaryCoy Beach Divas.title: Coy Beach Divas
GoldmaryCoy Beach Divas.description: Goldmary and Bernadetta descend from Elusia and the Adrestian Empire to the beaches of Askr, each held in her own unique esteem. They appear in Fire Emblem Engage / Three Houses.

ClanneSummer Fan.name: Clanne
ClanneSummer Fan.title: Summer Fan
ClanneSummer Fan.description: A 33rd Steward of the Dragon who wishes to burn the image of summer's Divine Dragon into his eyes. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

AlearSeaside Dragon.name: Alear
AlearSeaside Dragon.title: Seaside Dragon
AlearSeaside Dragon.description: After a thousand-year slumber, the Divine Dragon wakes to swim in the ocean for the first time in memory. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

CelicaOf Echoes.name: Celica
CelicaOf Echoes.title: Of Echoes
CelicaOf Echoes.description: One of the Emblems who were summoned to Elyos. Resides in the Ring of the Caring Princess. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia / Fire Emblem Engage.

GullveigGlittering Sunlight.name: Gullveig
GullveigGlittering Sunlight.title: Glittering Sunlight
GullveigGlittering Sunlight.description: Gullveig, the Golden Seer, and Seiðr, Goddess of Light, shining together with the summer sun, sparkling amongst the waves.

VaikeSunbaked Stunner.name: Vaike
VaikeSunbaked Stunner.title: Sunbaked Stunner
VaikeSunbaked Stunner.description: A hothead who sees Chrom as his rival, set on turning up the summer heat. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

OliviaWavecrest Dancer.name: Olivia
OliviaWavecrest Dancer.title: Wavecrest Dancer
OliviaWavecrest Dancer.description: A dancer from Ylisse. Enjoying the summer sun and the way her swimsuit moves as she dances. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

Ner\u00feuzBeach Chaperone.name: Nerþuz
Ner\u00feuzBeach Chaperone.title: Beach Chaperone
Ner\u00feuzBeach Chaperone.description: Goddess from Vanaheimr, the realm of light, and god of the land. Visiting the sea only so she can enjoy the summer sun with the lovely children of Midgard.

Hr\u00eddIsland Ice Prince.name: Hríd
Hr\u00eddIsland Ice Prince.title: Island Ice Prince
Hr\u00eddIsland Ice Prince.description: Prince of Nifl, Kingdom of Ice, and Fjorm's older brother. Having his first taste of tropical leisure time.

JarodNevassa General.name: Jarod
JarodNevassa General.title: Nevassa General
JarodNevassa General.description: General of the Begnion forces sent to Nevassa. With the support of Duke Numida, he ruthlessly dominated the locals. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

LeonardoFreedom's Arrow.name: Leonardo
LeonardoFreedom's Arrow.title: Freedom's Arrow
LeonardoFreedom's Arrow.description: An aristocrat from the hinterlands of Daein, alone in the world as a result of war. A member of the Dawn Brigade. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

EdwardBlade of Justice.name: Edward
EdwardBlade of Justice.title: Blade of Justice
EdwardBlade of Justice.description: A boy from the streets of Nevassa, the capital of Daein. A member of the Dawn Brigade. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

SotheDawning Zephyr.name: Sothe
SotheDawning Zephyr.title: Dawning Zephyr
SotheDawning Zephyr.description: A thief from Nevassa. Micaiah holds a special place in his heart. A member of the Dawn Brigade. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

MicaiahDawning Maiden.name: Micaiah
MicaiahDawning Maiden.title: Dawning Maiden
MicaiahDawning Maiden.description: A young woman who saves people with her empathic abilities and powers of foresight. A member of the Dawn Brigade. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

CorrinChild of Dawn.name: Corrin
CorrinChild of Dawn.title: Child of Dawn
CorrinChild of Dawn.description: A Hoshidan prince raised in Nohr. Guided by destiny, he fought against Garon, the king of Nohr, alongside his companions. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

SharenaPillars of Peace.name: Sharena
SharenaPillars of Peace.title: Pillars of Peace
SharenaPillars of Peace.description: Sharena of Askr and Veronica of Embla together at the bridal festival, dancing as one.

NelStoic Bride.name: Nel
NelStoic Bride.title: Stoic Bride
NelStoic Bride.description: A dragon from another world donning bridal dress and thinking of the precious one she lost long ago. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

LapisMighty Bride.name: Lapis
LapisMighty Bride.title: Mighty Bride
LapisMighty Bride.description: Prince Alcryst's retainer. Afraid of getting her outfit dirty, she is behaving a little more modestly than usual. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

EmblaClosed-Off Bride.name: Embla
EmblaClosed-Off Bride.title: Closed-Off Bride
EmblaClosed-Off Bride.description: God of the closed kingdom, which shares her name. She has arrived at the bridal festival adorned with a wedding dress of sorts.

AlcrystTender Groom.name: Alcryst
AlcrystTender Groom.title: Tender Groom
AlcrystTender Groom.description: Second prince of Brodia. Feeling unworthy of such outstanding garb, he nevertheless carries himself with an appropriate air of nobility. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

LloydVengeful Wolf.name: Lloyd
LloydVengeful Wolf.title: Vengeful Wolf
LloydVengeful Wolf.description: Member of the Black Fang assassins. After the loss of his younger brother, he dies himself, only to be made into a morph by Nergal. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

VeyleFell Successor.name: Veyle
VeyleFell Successor.title: Fell Successor
VeyleFell Successor.description: Daughter of the Fell Dragon. Full of destructive urges, she wishes to excel her siblings to be the sole successor to their father's power. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

NergalTraitor to Nabata.name: Nergal
NergalTraitor to Nabata.title: Traitor to Nabata
NergalTraitor to Nabata.description: A fiend who steals human quintessence to create living constructs called morphs to do his bidding. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

LumeraCorrupted Dragon.name: Lumera
LumeraCorrupted Dragon.title: Corrupted Dragon
LumeraCorrupted Dragon.description: The former Divine Dragon Monarch revived by the Fell Dragon. Wishes only for more time with her child. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

UrsulaBlackened Crow.name: Ursula
UrsulaBlackened Crow.title: Blackened Crow
UrsulaBlackened Crow.description: Member of the Black Fang assassins. Adores the Fang's puppetmaster, Sonia. Following her death, she has been made into a morph. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

LokiTrickster God.name: Loki
LokiTrickster God.title: Trickster God
LokiTrickster God.description: God who plays at chaos, deriving great joy from the messy nature of mortal emotions.

CandaceSly Snatcher.name: Candace
CandaceSly Snatcher.title: Sly Snatcher
CandaceSly Snatcher.description: A treasure hunter who travels the world. She uses her agility to get the better of her opponents and make off with what she can snatch. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

YukimuraPuppet Master.name: Yukimura
YukimuraPuppet Master.title: Puppet Master
YukimuraPuppet Master.description: Tactician in the service of Queen Mikoto of Hoshido. Uses automatons to do battle. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

HayatoDiviner of Reppu.name: Hayato
HayatoDiviner of Reppu.title: Diviner of Reppu
HayatoDiviner of Reppu.description: From the Wind Tribe, who live within Hoshido. Despite his age, he has a rare talent for magical techniques. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

MozuTragic Start.name: Mozu
MozuTragic Start.title: Tragic Start
MozuTragic Start.description: Joins Corrin after being saved from attacking monsters. Is good at farmwork and hunting. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

AzuraSong's Reflection.name: Azura
AzuraSong's Reflection.title: Song's Reflection
AzuraSong's Reflection.description: A princess of Nohr who was raised in Hoshido. Her song echoes across the battlefield, with her faith in Corrin granting her strength. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

RobinVessels of Fate.name: Robin
RobinVessels of Fate.title: Vessels of Fate
RobinVessels of Fate.description: Robin and Chrom, meeting now out of time. Is it an illusion or a miracle created out of the bonds that will one day form? They appear in Fire Emblem Awakening.

RobinFated Vessel.name: Robin
RobinFated Vessel.title: Fated Vessel
RobinFated Vessel.description: A boy who knows little of his father or the nature of his birth because he left with his mother soon after being born. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

LissaLittlest Princess.name: Lissa
LissaLittlest Princess.title: Littlest Princess
LissaLittlest Princess.description: Second princess of the Halidom of Ylisse and little sister to Emmeryn and Chrom. She is still young, but she is nevertheless kind to her core! Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

FrederickYouth in Service.name: Frederick
FrederickYouth in Service.title: Youth in Service
FrederickYouth in Service.description: A squire of the Halidom of Ylisse and personal guard to Prince Chrom. His diligent and earnest personality earned him his honorable post. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

EmmerynSelfless Exalt.name: Emmeryn
EmmerynSelfless Exalt.title: Selfless Exalt
EmmerynSelfless Exalt.description: Took the throne as exalt of the Halidom of Ylisse before the age of 10. She wishes for a time of peace, without violence. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

IkeOf Radiance.name: Ike
IkeOf Radiance.title: Of Radiance
IkeOf Radiance.description: One of the Emblems who were summoned to Elyos. Resides in the Ring of the Radiant Hero. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn / Fire Emblem Engage.

ArlenMage of Khadein.name: Arlen
ArlenMage of Khadein.title: Mage of Khadein
ArlenMage of Khadein.description: A mage entrusted with Khadein's future by the sage Wendell. He is envious of Merric, who inherited Excalibur. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

CastorLoving Son.name: Castor
CastorLoving Son.title: Loving Son
CastorLoving Son.description: A hunter who lived in Talys and joined the war effort so he could afford medicine for his sickly mother. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

YuliyaPrincess of Grust.name: Yuliya
YuliyaPrincess of Grust.title: Princess of Grust
YuliyaPrincess of Grust.description: Surviving member of the royal family of Grust, and sister to a twin. After the War of Shadows, Wendell took her under his protection. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

CaedaMarth's Faithful.name: Caeda
CaedaMarth's Faithful.title: Marth's Faithful
CaedaMarth's Faithful.description: Princess of the small kingdom of Talys. She and Prince Marth, who fled from Altea to Talys, share a close and unbreakable bond. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

MerricWind Pontifex.name: Merric
MerricWind Pontifex.title: Wind Pontifex
MerricWind Pontifex.description: A mage who grew up with Marth, the prince of Altea. After two wars, he and Marth's sister, Elice, have learned to read each other's hearts. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

SylvainSpring Flingster.name: Sylvain
SylvainSpring Flingster.title: Spring Flingster
SylvainSpring Flingster.description: Heir to the title of Margrave Gautier. He has rushed to the spring festival in the hopes of making new acquaintances. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses

MirabilisSpring Daydream.name: Mirabilis
MirabilisSpring Daydream.title: Spring Daydream
MirabilisSpring Daydream.description: A ljósálfr from Ljósálfheimr, the realm of dreams, who brings daydreams to mortals. Looking forward to the supreme napping the spring festival allows.

LinhardtSpring Snoozer.name: Linhardt
LinhardtSpring Snoozer.title: Spring Snoozer
LinhardtSpring Snoozer.description: Heir to House Hevring who has found time between his studies of Crests to participate in the spring festival. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

FrammeSpring Fangirl.name: Framme
FrammeSpring Fangirl.title: Spring Fangirl
FrammeSpring Fangirl.description: A 33rd Steward of the Dragon who hopes the Divine Dragon notices her at the spring festival. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Chlo\u00e9Spring Wings.name: Chloé
Chlo\u00e9Spring Wings.title: Spring Wings
Chlo\u00e9Spring Wings.description: Pegasus knights who hail from Firene and Ylisse, celebrating the spring festival in rabbit outfits. They appear in Fire Emblem Engage / Awakening.

AlearEngaging Fire.name: Alear
AlearEngaging Fire.title: Engaging Fire
AlearEngaging Fire.description: The hero who brought peace to the world by bringing his companions and the Emblems together and fighting alongside them. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

MauvierPenitent Knight.name: Mauvier
MauvierPenitent Knight.title: Penitent Knight
MauvierPenitent Knight.description: Veyle's knight and former member of the Four Hounds. He's a loyal warrior who favors the straightforward, direct approach. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

RosadoAdorable Artist.name: Rosado
RosadoAdorable Artist.title: Adorable Artist
RosadoAdorable Artist.description: A soldier from the royal castle of Elusia and Hortensia's retainer. A talented painter and fashionista. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

KagetsuOnigiri Samurai.name: Kagetsu
KagetsuOnigiri Samurai.title: Onigiri Samurai
KagetsuOnigiri Samurai.description: Ivy's retainer and an affable soldier from the royal castle of Elusia. He enjoys sparring and dining on the cuisine of Pale Sands. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

HortensiaLittle Charmer.name: Hortensia
HortensiaLittle Charmer.title: Little Charmer
HortensiaLittle Charmer.description: Second princess of Elusia and Ivy's younger sister. Though selfish, she loves her family and all of those close to her. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

IvySnow Queen.name: Ivy
IvySnow Queen.title: Snow Queen
IvySnow Queen.description: Crown princess of Elusia, Kingdom of Knowledge. Unfailingly upholds the dignity and majesty of royalty. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

EphraimArdent Prince.name: Ephraim
EphraimArdent Prince.title: Ardent Prince
EphraimArdent Prince.description: Prince of Renais in search of a present for his twin sister, Eirika, who has gone off on her own to seek elsewhere. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

VigardeWarmhearted Sire.name: Vigarde
VigardeWarmhearted Sire.title: Warmhearted Sire
VigardeWarmhearted Sire.description: Beloved emperor of Grado, once known as the Silent Emperor. He is said to have great concern for the well-being of all his people, far and wide. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

SelenaAdmiring General.name: Selena
SelenaAdmiring General.title: Admiring General
SelenaAdmiring General.description: A magic user and one of the Imperial Three who goes by the moniker Fluorspar. Adores Emperor Vigarde, who saved her village from disaster. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

MyrrhAdored Dragon.name: Myrrh
MyrrhAdored Dragon.title: Adored Dragon
MyrrhAdored Dragon.description: A girl from the village of Caer Pelyn, where she is honored as the Great Dragon. Separated from Ephraim and friends when summoned to Askr. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

LyonEsteemed Royals.name: Lyon
LyonEsteemed Royals.title: Esteemed Royals
LyonEsteemed Royals.description: Quiet, mild-mannered prince of Grado and Princess Eirika of Renais who both share a strong connection with Prince Ephraim. They appear in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

MarthOf Beginnings.name: Marth
MarthOf Beginnings.title: Of Beginnings
MarthOf Beginnings.description: One of the Emblems who were summoned to Elyos. Resides in the Ring of the Hero-King. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem / Fire Emblem Engage.

LumeraIn Distant Skies.name: Lumera
LumeraIn Distant Skies.title: In Distant Skies
LumeraIn Distant Skies.description: Divine Dragon who watches over Elyos. A transcendent being who is aware of the fate she follows. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

AltinaUnrivaled Dawn.name: Altina
AltinaUnrivaled Dawn.title: Unrivaled Dawn
AltinaUnrivaled Dawn.description: One of the Three Heroes who fought a dark god under the protection of a goddess. Interested in the utopia in Nabata and its sublime ideology. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

TormodIndomitable Will.name: Tormod
TormodIndomitable Will.title: Indomitable Will
TormodIndomitable Will.description: Boy who claims to lead the Laguz Emancipation Army. Confidently pursues his ideals for a new world. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

JunoNimble Grace.name: Juno
JunoNimble Grace.title: Nimble Grace
JunoNimble Grace.description: The eldest of three sisters from Ilia. Visits Nabata's festival as a representative of Edessa. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

IgreneSworn Protectors.name: Igrene
IgreneSworn Protectors.title: Sworn Protectors
IgreneSworn Protectors.description: Igrene, guardian of Nabata, with Louise, countess of Reglay. These two protectors look ahead to what the future will bring. They appear in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade / The Blazing Blade.
IgreneSworn Protectors.origin: The Binding Blade + The Blazing Blade

HawkeyeTaciturn Guardian.name: Hawkeye
HawkeyeTaciturn Guardian.title: Taciturn Guardian
HawkeyeTaciturn Guardian.description: Loyal servant of Archsage Athos, one of the Eight Legends. Protects the village of Arcadia in Nabata, his master's paradise. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

PerneDacian Scoundrel.name: Perne
PerneDacian Scoundrel.title: Dacian Scoundrel
PerneDacian Scoundrel.description: Leader of the Dandelion Bandits. Though he seems unfriendly, he doesn't believe in ending a life. Appears in Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.

TinaPlayful Scamp.name: Tina
TinaPlayful Scamp.title: Playful Scamp
TinaPlayful Scamp.description: Younger sister of Safy, cleric of Tarrah. Leaves town in pursuit of her sister only to be swept up into a band of thieves. Appears in Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.

ReinhardtThrud Reborn.name: Reinhardt
ReinhardtThrud Reborn.title: Thrud Reborn
ReinhardtThrud Reborn.description: A powerful and respected mage knight of House Friege. Well-mannered and loyal, he is acclaimed as the second coming of the crusader Thrud. Appears in Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.

SafyFont of Piety.name: Safy
SafyFont of Piety.title: Font of Piety
SafyFont of Piety.description: A cleric of the city of Tarrah. Captured and held by pirates while on a journey to recruit warriors to help liberate her homeland. Appears in Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.

LaraStep Lively.name: Lara
LaraStep Lively.title: Step Lively
LaraStep Lively.description: A member of the Magi, who work to bring freedom to Munster. Bursting with vitality. Appears in Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.

Sei\u00f0rTime's Goddesses.name: Seiðr
Sei\u00f0rTime's Goddesses.title: Time's Goddesses
Sei\u00f0rTime's Goddesses.description: Seiðr and Heiðr, goddesses of the realm of light. The two of them, who are like sisters, have come to bless the new year with light.

Ner\u00feuzNew-Year Doter.name: Nerþuz
Ner\u00feuzNew-Year Doter.title: New-Year Doter
Ner\u00feuzNew-Year Doter.description: God of the land who hails from Vanaheimr, the realm of light. She has joined in the New Year's festivities to experience it alongside all the mortals.

KvasirUnknown Future.name: Kvasir
KvasirUnknown Future.title: Unknown Future
KvasirUnknown Future.description: The Golden Seer before she became Gullveig. Experiencing her first New Year's celebration.

KanaRising Sunlight.name: Kana
KanaRising Sunlight.title: Rising Sunlight
KanaRising Sunlight.description: Corrin's daughter, always lively and cheerful, celebrating the new year and taking in all the festival sights with a smile on her face. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

KanaRising Dragon.name: Kana
KanaRising Dragon.title: Rising Dragon
KanaRising Dragon.description: Corrin's son, always lively and cheerful, with new light in his eyes at the prospect of visiting a shrine for the new year. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

CamillaAlluring Darkness.name: Camilla
CamillaAlluring Darkness.title: Alluring Darkness
CamillaAlluring Darkness.description: Eldest princess of Nohr. Both elegant and bewitching, she is often praised for being ever more and more alluring. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

BylethFrosty Professors.name: Byleth
BylethFrosty Professors.title: Frosty Professors
BylethFrosty Professors.description: Byleth and Byleth, defying the boundaries between their worlds. They participate in Askr's winter festival in the interest of their students. They appear in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

YunakaSpirited Envoy.name: Yunaka
YunakaSpirited Envoy.title: Spirited Envoy
YunakaSpirited Envoy.description: A wandering thief who has taken it upon herself to stir up excitement for the winter festival with her spirited outfit and attitude. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

EdelgardSnowfall Future.name: Edelgard
EdelgardSnowfall Future.title: Snowfall Future
EdelgardSnowfall Future.description: Princess and heir apparent of the Adrestian Empire. Advances on Askr's winter festival with the intent of ensuring its success. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

DimitriBlessed Protector.name: Dimitri
DimitriBlessed Protector.title: Blessed Protector
DimitriBlessed Protector.description: Crown prince of the Holy Kingdom of Faerghus, delivering winter warmth to the people of Askr as their winter envoy. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

ClaudeYuletide Schemer.name: Claude
ClaudeYuletide Schemer.title: Yuletide Schemer
ClaudeYuletide Schemer.description: Heir to House Riegan, leader of the Leicester Alliance, joining in Askr's winter festival in the role of envoy. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

RatatoskrMending Hand.name: Ratatoskr
RatatoskrMending Hand.title: Mending Hand
RatatoskrMending Hand.description: A member of Yggdrasill's Healing Hands who has a tendency to get overwhelmed when there are things that need to be done. Has healed illnesses across the nine realms.

LucinaFate's Resolve.name: Lucina
LucinaFate's Resolve.title: Fate's Resolve
LucinaFate's Resolve.description: A princess and daughter of Chrom who traveled to the past, where she studied and trained to change her world's desperate fate. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

LaurentThe Elucidator.name: Laurent
LaurentThe Elucidator.title: The Elucidator
LaurentThe Elucidator.description: Miriel's son and a serious student at the top of his class. He often finds himself being taken advantage of, but he can be frightening when angered. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

InigoFlower Picker.name: Inigo
InigoFlower Picker.title: Flower Picker
InigoFlower Picker.description: Olivia's son. Blessed with a natural talent for dance and a flair for philandering, but is shy by nature. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

SeveraSecret Dreamer.name: Severa
SeveraSecret Dreamer.title: Secret Dreamer
SeveraSecret Dreamer.description: Cordelia's daughter, who is always comparing herself to her mother. She is kind to her friends, but acts as if she has something to prove. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

ValidarFell Architect.name: Validar
ValidarFell Architect.title: Fell Architect
ValidarFell Architect.description: Leader of a religious sect that worships the Fell Dragon, Grima. Takes the throne as king of Plegia after Gangrel's death. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

KvasirSeer of the Past.name: Kvasir
KvasirSeer of the Past.title: Seer of the Past
KvasirSeer of the Past.description: Gullveig, the Golden Seer, as she once existed. A lonely goddess who wishes for friendship deep in her heart.

GullveigGolden Seer.name: Gullveig
GullveigGolden Seer.title: Golden Seer
GullveigGolden Seer.description: A seer who, in the future, has already driven the world to the brink of destruction. Can alter time and bend the future to her whims.

FargusBadon Buccaneer.name: Fargus
FargusBadon Buccaneer.title: Badon Buccaneer
