FargusBadon Buccaneer.description: Captain of a band of pirates who operate out of Badon. A man of his word who sticks to his code, he is beloved by many of his subordinates. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

GinnungagapRuler of Nihility.name: Ginnungagap
GinnungagapRuler of Nihility.title: Ruler of Nihility
GinnungagapRuler of Nihility.description: She who rules the nothingness and seeks to crush hope itself, bringing an end to dreams, humanity, the Lady of Nightmare, and all álfar.

NinoFang's Heart.name: Nino
NinoFang's Heart.title: Fang's Heart
NinoFang's Heart.description: Nino, her ties with her false family in the Black Fang finally cut. She looks to the future having overcome her past with the help of new friends. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

IsadoraEscort of Pherae.name: Isadora
IsadoraEscort of Pherae.title: Escort of Pherae
IsadoraEscort of Pherae.description: A knight of Pherae known for being a paladin of marked beauty. She serves as the personal guard of Eleanora, wife of Marquess Pherae. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

HarkenTroubled Warrior.name: Harken
HarkenTroubled Warrior.title: Troubled Warrior
HarkenTroubled Warrior.description: A knight who single-handedly infiltrated the Black Fang to exact his vengeance after failing to stop the abduction of the Marquess Pherae. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

WilUnequaled Archer.name: Wil
WilUnequaled Archer.title: Unequaled Archer
WilUnequaled Archer.description: A young man from a village in Pherae. With his easy manner and friendly personality, even those who are initially wary soon warm up to him. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

ZelgiusNinja Knight.name: Zelgius
ZelgiusNinja Knight.title: Ninja Knight
ZelgiusNinja Knight.description: The most powerful general within the whole of the Begnion Empire. Has his quest for strength found its end in the way of the ninja? Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

SanakiDawnsworn Ninja.name: Sanaki
SanakiDawnsworn Ninja.title: Dawnsworn Ninja
SanakiDawnsworn Ninja.description: Sisters, free from the fate of the apostle, using their ninja garb to conceal their worldly roles. They appear in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

SaizoHoshido's Flame.name: Saizo
SaizoHoshido's Flame.title: Hoshido's Flame
SaizoHoshido's Flame.description: A ninja who serves Ryoma of Hoshido. Determined not to lose to mere novices in the craft he's mastered. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

ReinaSanguine Shinobi.name: Reina
ReinaSanguine Shinobi.title: Sanguine Shinobi
ReinaSanguine Shinobi.description: A warrior from Hoshido known for her warmth toward her friends and the ruthlessness she shows her enemies. Enjoys the feeling of a nice slaughter. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

HeatherWandering Ninja.name: Heather
HeatherWandering Ninja.title: Wandering Ninja
HeatherWandering Ninja.description: A wandering thief from Crimea. She is happy to find that so many outstanding women have been gathered together in Askr. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

VeyleGentle Dragon.name: Veyle
VeyleGentle Dragon.title: Gentle Dragon
VeyleGentle Dragon.description: Daughter of the Fell Dragon. She has devoted a loving heart to working for the good of humanity. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

MarlaDuma's Witch.name: Marla
MarlaDuma's Witch.title: Duma's Witch
MarlaDuma's Witch.description: Eldest daughter of Jedah, high priest of the Duma Faithful. She looks down on her sister Sonya, who fled life as a witch. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

PeonyCherished Dream.name: Peony
PeonyCherished Dream.title: Cherished Dream
PeonyCherished Dream.description: A ljósálfr from Ljósálfheimr, the realm of dreams. Delivers pleasant dreams to mortals. Her connection with Triandra has awakened a new power.

TriandraReverent Dream.name: Triandra
TriandraReverent Dream.title: Reverent Dream
TriandraReverent Dream.description: A dökkálfr from Dökkálfheimr, the realm of nightmares. Delivers terrible dreams to mortals. Her connection with Peony has awakened a new power.

SonyaBeautiful Mage.name: Sonya
SonyaBeautiful Mage.title: Beautiful Mage
SonyaBeautiful Mage.description: Daughter of Jedah, high priest of the Duma Faithful. She swore vengeance on her father for giving her sisters over to the Fell God. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

HestiaDuma's Witch.name: Hestia
HestiaDuma's Witch.title: Duma's Witch
HestiaDuma's Witch.description: Second-eldest daughter of Jedah, high priest of the Duma Faithful. She looks down on her sister Sonya, who fled life as a witch. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

MycenZofia's Champion.name: Mycen
MycenZofia's Champion.title: Zofia's Champion
MycenZofia's Champion.description: A hero who rose from soldier to knight, and on to earn the title of count. Retired, he lives in Ram Village with his grandson, Alm. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

TimerraTrick or Meat.name: Timerra
TimerraTrick or Meat.title: Trick or Meat
TimerraTrick or Meat.description: The crown princess of Solm. She came to eat and sing along with everyone at the festival. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

SeadallMisfortune-Teller.name: Seadall
SeadallMisfortune-Teller.title: Misfortune-Teller
SeadallMisfortune-Teller.description: A dancer from Solm, and a skilled fortune-teller. He's maintaining his disciplined diet even with all the many sweets around the harvest festival. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

KellamPumpkin Knight.name: Kellam
KellamPumpkin Knight.title: Pumpkin Knight
KellamPumpkin Knight.description: The most easily forgotten armored knight in Chrom's Shepherds. Will anyone notice that he dressed up for the festival? Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

FlaynSilly Kitty-Cat.name: Flayn
FlaynSilly Kitty-Cat.title: Silly Kitty-Cat
FlaynSilly Kitty-Cat.description: A girl who lives in Garreg Mach Monastery with her brother, Seteth. She's come to Askr's harvest festival dressed in a cat costume. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

AnnaTwice the Anna.name: Anna
AnnaTwice the Anna.title: Twice the Anna
AnnaTwice the Anna.description: Sisters from different worlds. They don the other's outfit and work together to develop a marketing plan. They appear in Fire Emblem Engage / Fire Emblem Awakening.

ElinciaUndaunted Queen.name: Elincia
ElinciaUndaunted Queen.title: Undaunted Queen
ElinciaUndaunted Queen.description: A queen who always stood by her people and healed her country in the wake of war. Praised as Crimea's heart, she has earned her subjects' respect. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

ArionGungnir's Heir.name: Arion
ArionGungnir's Heir.title: Gungnir's Heir
ArionGungnir's Heir.description: Prince of Thracia, land of wyvern knights. Son of King Travant, he has been entrusted with his homeland's future. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

PlumeriaRapturous Dream.name: Plumeria
PlumeriaRapturous Dream.title: Rapturous Dream
PlumeriaRapturous Dream.description: A jaded dökkálfr from Dökkálfheimr, the realm of nightmares. She delivers salacious dreams to mortals with a new power, as if she once again received the dream nectar that made her álfr.

CedSage of the Wind.name: Ced
CedSage of the Wind.title: Sage of the Wind
CedSage of the Wind.description: Prince of Silesse and inheritor of Forseti. Leads the fight against an empire, searching for his father. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War / Fire Emblem: Thracia 776.
CedSage of the Wind.origin: Genealogy of the Holy War + Thracia 776

FeeAspiring Knight.name: Fee
FeeAspiring Knight.title: Aspiring Knight
FeeAspiring Knight.description: Daughter of Erinys, of the Four Heavenly Knights of Silesse. Seeks her brother, Ced, who set out in search of their father. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

PattyYouthful Thief.name: Patty
PattyYouthful Thief.title: Youthful Thief
PattyYouthful Thief.description: A thief who targets imperials and ruffians alike, stealing for orphans she cares for. Her mother Brigid's noble blood flows within her. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

FebailMercenary Waif.name: Febail
FebailMercenary Waif.title: Mercenary Waif
FebailMercenary Waif.description: Inheritor of the Holy Yewfelle and descendant of Ullr. Raised in an orphanage after his mother, Brigid, went missing. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

KageroBond Unwavering.name: Kagero
KageroBond Unwavering.title: Bond Unwavering
KageroBond Unwavering.description: Childhood friends Kagero and Orochi from Hoshido putting the strength of their bond on display at the wind festival. They appear in Fire Emblem Fates.

FugaForce of Gales.name: Fuga
FugaForce of Gales.title: Force of Gales
FugaForce of Gales.description: The chief of the Wind Tribe, who shares close ties with the kingdom of Hoshido. Though he may be growing older, he's still in peak physical condition. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

DagrBluster Princess.name: Dagr
DagrBluster Princess.title: Bluster Princess
DagrBluster Princess.description: Princess of Jötunheimr, she set her royal duties aside and rushed to join in the wind-themed festivities.

ClaudeGolden Breeze.name: Claude
ClaudeGolden Breeze.title: Golden Breeze
ClaudeGolden Breeze.description: Heir to House Riegan, drawn to the festivities celebrating the wind. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

CatriaWindswept Knight.name: Catria
CatriaWindswept Knight.title: Windswept Knight
CatriaWindswept Knight.description: The middle child of three pegasus sisters, taking part in the wind festival accompanied by her beloved steed. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

AlearAwoken Divinity.name: Alear
AlearAwoken Divinity.title: Awoken Divinity
AlearAwoken Divinity.description: She who, dressed in white and wielding a gleaming blade, once exterminated the Fell Dragon to save the world. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

CyrilRhea's Attendant.name: Cyril
CyrilRhea's Attendant.title: Rhea's Attendant
CyrilRhea's Attendant.description: Came from Almyra, having lost his family when he was young. Archbishop Rhea took him in when he was working at House Goneril. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

RobinExalt's Deliverer.name: Robin
RobinExalt's Deliverer.title: Exalt's Deliverer
RobinExalt's Deliverer.description: The exalt Chrom's most trusted tactician. Possessed of a mysterious charisma that draws people to him. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

SorenRadiant Confidant.name: Soren
SorenRadiant Confidant.title: Radiant Confidant
SorenRadiant Confidant.description: A member of the Greil Mercenaries. Supports Ike with his extraordinary talent as a tactician. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

GullveigSeer Beyond Time.name: Gullveig
GullveigSeer Beyond Time.title: Seer Beyond Time
GullveigSeer Beyond Time.description: Seiðr, goddess of Vanaheimr, the realm of light, having become Gullveig, the Golden Seer.

CorrinSilent Bloodline.name: Corrin
CorrinSilent Bloodline.title: Silent Bloodline
CorrinSilent Bloodline.description: Born in Hoshido and raised as a princess of Nohr, she has overcome many trials and grown alongside her many companions. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

AyraTogether in Tea.name: Ayra
AyraTogether in Tea.title: Together in Tea
AyraTogether in Tea.description: Princess Ayra of Isaach is joined by Mercedes of the Adrestian Empire, and the pair are serving tea together! They appear in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War / Three Houses.
AyraTogether in Tea.origin: Genealogy of the Holy War + Three Houses

TailtiuTeatime Mingler.name: Tailtiu
TailtiuTeatime Mingler.title: Teatime Mingler
TailtiuTeatime Mingler.description: Noblewoman of House Friege and descendant of the crusader Thrud. She holds tea parties to form personal connections. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

SigurdProper Pourer.name: Sigurd
SigurdProper Pourer.title: Proper Pourer
SigurdProper Pourer.description: Heir to Chalphy, participating in tea parties to grow closer to his companions. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

LysitheaTea Sweetener.name: Lysithea
LysitheaTea Sweetener.title: Tea Sweetener
LysitheaTea Sweetener.description: Daughter of Count Ordelia and noble of the Leicester Alliance. Renowned for her brilliance, she is trying her hand at the role of waitress. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

FerdinandHighborn Sipper.name: Ferdinand
FerdinandHighborn Sipper.title: Highborn Sipper
FerdinandHighborn Sipper.description: Son and heir of Duke Aegir, the prime minister of the Adrestian Empire. Plays the role of waiter in a manner befitting a noble. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

FreyrDream-King.name: Freyr
FreyrDream-King.title: Dream-King
FreyrDream-King.description: Dream-King of Ljósálfheimr, the dream realm. He is the god of dreams and wishes for all to lead tranquil, blissful lives.

ZephiaScheming Dragon.name: Zephia
ZephiaScheming Dragon.title: Scheming Dragon
ZephiaScheming Dragon.description: Servant of the Fell Dragon Sombron and leader of the Four Hounds. She is a Mage Dragon who has lived thousands of years. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

AlearDragon Youth.name: Alear
AlearDragon Youth.title: Dragon Youth
AlearDragon Youth.description: Successor to the Divine Dragon, awoken from a long sleep. Summons Emblems to lead the world to peace. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

EitrHand of Nothing.name: Eitr
EitrHand of Nothing.title: Hand of Nothing
EitrHand of Nothing.description: Unquestioning servant of the ruler of nothingness, she lacks the confidence to express her own will.

AlcrystTender Archer.name: Alcryst
AlcrystTender Archer.title: Tender Archer
AlcrystTender Archer.description: Second prince of Brodia and Diamant's younger brother, he is prone to self-deprecation. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

DiamantRising Power.name: Diamant
DiamantRising Power.title: Rising Power
DiamantRising Power.description: Crown prince of Brodia, the Kingdom of Might. Has a strong, genuine spirit and the trust of his people. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

LapisMighty Flower.name: Lapis
LapisMighty Flower.title: Mighty Flower
LapisMighty Flower.description: A warrior of Brodia and retainer to Alcryst, she boasts both incredible strength and extensive knowledge of everyday living. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

CitrinneCaring Noble.name: Citrinne
CitrinneCaring Noble.title: Caring Noble
CitrinneCaring Noble.description: A noble of Brodia and retainer to Alcryst, she shares blood with the royal family and has an incredible fortune at her disposal. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

YmirSeasons of Life.name: Ymir
YmirSeasons of Life.title: Seasons of Life
YmirSeasons of Life.description: Ymir, the dragon of life, with Eir. They are aglow with the radiance of life, enjoying the Askran summer to the fullest.

TharjaBeach Dark Mage.name: Tharja
TharjaBeach Dark Mage.title: Beach Dark Mage
TharjaBeach Dark Mage.description: A mage of Plegia, sure to curse something or someone on the sun-beaten sands. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

IvyTidal Breeze.name: Ivy
IvyTidal Breeze.title: Tidal Breeze
IvyTidal Breeze.description: Crown princess of Elusia. Though she has no enthusiasm for summer, it is tolerable spent by the Divine Dragon's side. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

FjormSeaside Thaw.name: Fjorm
FjormSeaside Thaw.title: Seaside Thaw
FjormSeaside Thaw.description: The second princess of Nifl, the Kingdom of Ice. Her heart is filled with excitement experiencing her first swim in the ocean.

DonnelSunny Villager.name: Donnel
DonnelSunny Villager.title: Sunny Villager
DonnelSunny Villager.description: A farm boy from the countryside of Ylisse out enjoying the ocean with his beloved pot. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

GuinivereQueen of Bern.name: Guinivere
GuinivereQueen of Bern.title: Queen of Bern
GuinivereQueen of Bern.description: New queen of Bern, having inherited the throne from Zephiel, now seeking to rebuild Bern for the sake of her people. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

ShezMercenary Shine.name: Shez
ShezMercenary Shine.title: Mercenary Shine
ShezMercenary Shine.description: A mercenary from Fódlan given unexpected orders to take some time off seaside in Askr. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

ShezMercenary Shade.name: Shez
ShezMercenary Shade.title: Mercenary Shade
ShezMercenary Shade.description: A mercenary from Fódlan having been tasked with taking a vacation at the Askran coast. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

ShamirHeartbeats United.name: Shamir
ShamirHeartbeats United.title: Heartbeats United
ShamirHeartbeats United.description: Shamir and Catherine, both members of the Knights of Seiros. The two have dedicated themselves to enjoying their time at the beach. They appear in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

L'ArachelSummer Princess.name: L'Arachel
L'ArachelSummer Princess.title: Summer Princess
L'ArachelSummer Princess.description: Princess of Rausten, gracing the beach in her swimsuit to bring some summer color to Askr! Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

EphraimSunshine Valiant.name: Ephraim
EphraimSunshine Valiant.title: Sunshine Valiant
EphraimSunshine Valiant.description: Prince of Renais looking for any excuse to train during his vacation at the ocean. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

Hei\u00f0rInnocent Goddess.name: Heiðr
Hei\u00f0rInnocent Goddess.title: Innocent Goddess
Hei\u00f0rInnocent Goddess.description: Goddess of Vanaheimr, the realm of light. Pure and innocent, she adores Seiðr like a sister.

FirSwordmaiden.name: Fir
FirSwordmaiden.title: Swordmaiden
FirSwordmaiden.description: With blade in hand, has worked to polish her skills, following in her mother's shadow. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

SaulLoving Shepherd.name: Saul
SaulLoving Shepherd.title: Loving Shepherd
SaulLoving Shepherd.description: A priest of Saint Elimine who cannot refrain from speaking with any beautiful woman he comes across in his travels. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

DorothyDevoted Archer.name: Dorothy
DorothyDevoted Archer.title: Devoted Archer
DorothyDevoted Archer.description: A member of the Elimine Church and bodyguard to the priest Saul, at the mercy of the priest's carefree behavior. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

NoahMercenary-Errant.name: Noah
NoahMercenary-Errant.title: Mercenary-Errant
NoahMercenary-Errant.description: A member of the Ilian mercenaries who joins Pherae's army under General Zelot. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

MurdockLoyal General.name: Murdock
MurdockLoyal General.title: Loyal General
MurdockLoyal General.description: Leader of the Wyvern Generals, who head the army of Bern. He has given his support for his country since even before his king took power. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

HinokaThundering Wings.name: Hinoka
HinokaThundering Wings.title: Thundering Wings
HinokaThundering Wings.description: Queen of Hoshido, having taken up both the convictions and the divine weapons of her brothers, Ryoma and Takumi. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

TikiBridal Reflections.name: Tiki
TikiBridal Reflections.title: Bridal Reflections
TikiBridal Reflections.description: The Voice, Tiki, who met her younger self at the bridal festival and is having a lovely time together with herself. They appear in Fire Emblem Awakening / Mystery of the Emblem.

Say'riRighteous Bride.name: Say'ri
Say'riRighteous Bride.title: Righteous Bride
Say'riRighteous Bride.description: Princess of Chon'sin who has been showered with festive bridal blessings. She takes part despite being puzzled by the festival at large. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

RobinKeen Groom.name: Robin
RobinKeen Groom.title: Keen Groom
RobinKeen Groom.description: Tactician of Ylisse and Chrom's other half. He has been appointed to the role of groom and is working on a strategy for surviving the festival. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

FlaviaBold Bride.name: Flavia
FlaviaBold Bride.title: Bold Bride
FlaviaBold Bride.description: Khan of Regna Ferox appearing at the bridal festival in bridal attire, much to everyone's surprise—including her own. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

AnnaSecret Charmer.name: Anna
AnnaSecret Charmer.title: Secret Charmer
AnnaSecret Charmer.description: A merchant with many secrets who has been swept up in the world of the bridal festival, now hatching schemes to make an easy fortune. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

LinusSavage Dog.name: Linus
LinusSavage Dog.title: Savage Dog
LinusSavage Dog.description: Member of the Black Fang assassins. Following his death, he was made into a morph by Nergal and is now a living construct. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

ChromFell Exalt.name: Chrom
ChromFell Exalt.title: Fell Exalt
ChromFell Exalt.description: Former exalt of Ylisse who lost his life to the Fell Dragon Grima and became lord over the Risen. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

BylethVengeance Vessel.name: Byleth
BylethVengeance Vessel.title: Vengeance Vessel
BylethVengeance Vessel.description: An elite mercenary known as the Ashen Demon, but she seems to have changed somehow—and now she seeks vengeance. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

MariaRitual Sacrifice.name: Maria
MariaRitual Sacrifice.title: Ritual Sacrifice
MariaRitual Sacrifice.description: Youngest princess of Macedon, kidnapped and robbed of her consciousness by Gharnef for use as a sacrifice to Medeus. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

AnankosSeething Silence.name: Anankos
AnankosSeething Silence.title: Seething Silence
AnankosSeething Silence.description: The dragon of wisdom having succumbed to madness. The memories of those he once held dear lie in the depths beneath the waves. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

Ner\u00feuzGod of the Land.name: Nerþuz
Ner\u00feuzGod of the Land.title: God of the Land
Ner\u00feuzGod of the Land.description: Goddess of Vanaheimr, the realm of light. She exudes a maternal aura and adores all the many creatures who live upon the land.

CorneliaSaint Consumed.name: Cornelia
CorneliaSaint Consumed.title: Saint Consumed
CorneliaSaint Consumed.description: A mage from the Holy Kingdom of Faerghus. She was once considered a saintly figure before one day becoming something quite different. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

FelixLone-Wolf Blade.name: Felix
FelixLone-Wolf Blade.title: Lone-Wolf Blade
FelixLone-Wolf Blade.description: Second son of the Holy Kingdom of Faerghus's House Fraldarius, a prestigious noble family. He seeks to grow stronger on his own terms. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

IngridBeacon of Honor.name: Ingrid
IngridBeacon of Honor.title: Beacon of Honor
IngridBeacon of Honor.description: Eldest daughter of the Holy Kingdom of Faerghus's House Galatea. Wields her spear with chivalrous intent. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

SylvainConsummate Flirt.name: Sylvain
SylvainConsummate Flirt.title: Consummate Flirt
SylvainConsummate Flirt.description: Heir to House Gautier. Finds the allure of beautiful women irresistible. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

RheaLoving Matriarch.name: Rhea
RheaLoving Matriarch.title: Loving Matriarch
RheaLoving Matriarch.description: Archbishop who guides the Church of Seiros. Watches over her students with the calm air of a caring mother. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

RebeccaBreezy Scamp.name: Rebecca
RebeccaBreezy Scamp.title: Breezy Scamp
RebeccaBreezy Scamp.description: Born and raised in a village within the territory of Pherae. Worries for Dan, her older brother, who left the village with her neighbor Wil. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

MarkWinds of Hope.name: Mark
MarkWinds of Hope.title: Winds of Hope
MarkWinds of Hope.description: A master tactician with the power to change history and the girl from the Lorca tribe who became the staunchest of allies. They appear in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

LuciusCalming Light.name: Lucius
LuciusCalming Light.title: Calming Light
LuciusCalming Light.description: A young monk who serves House Cornwell. Looks sickly, often grimacing in pain. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

HectorSworn Friend.name: Hector
HectorSworn Friend.title: Sworn Friend
HectorSworn Friend.description: A young noble of House Ostia, part of the Lycian League. Respects his older brother Uther, who is known for his discernment. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

EliwoodPledged Friend.name: Eliwood
EliwoodPledged Friend.title: Pledged Friend
EliwoodPledged Friend.description: A young noble of House Pherae, part of the Lycian League. Sincere and considerate toward everyone he meets. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

YuriUnderground Lord.name: Yuri
YuriUnderground Lord.title: Underground Lord
YuriUnderground Lord.description: Leader of the Ashen Wolf House and proficient with both magic and the sword. He fights for those who can't protect themselves, seeking no favor. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

TanaSoaring Princess.name: Tana
TanaSoaring Princess.title: Soaring Princess
TanaSoaring Princess.description: Princess of Frelia. Takes to the sky with a bow connected to the bow Nidhogg, her brother Innes having tasked her with looking after it. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

GilliamWall of Silence.name: Gilliam
GilliamWall of Silence.title: Wall of Silence
GilliamWall of Silence.description: Commander of Frelia's guard at Border Mulan. His menacing look conceals a caring heart. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

VanessaDutiful Rider.name: Vanessa
VanessaDutiful Rider.title: Dutiful Rider
VanessaDutiful Rider.description: A pegasus knight from Frelia who is both very serious and sincere. She also looks up to her sister Syrene. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

SyreneGraceful Rider.name: Syrene
SyreneGraceful Rider.title: Graceful Rider
SyreneGraceful Rider.description: Famed commander of Frelia's third battalion of pegasus knights, as well as Princess Tana's bodyguard. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

VigardeSilent Emperor.name: Vigarde
VigardeSilent Emperor.title: Silent Emperor
VigardeSilent Emperor.description: The once-admired Emperor of Grado. Known as the Silent Emperor, he has been reduced to only a shadow of his former self. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

TriandraSunlit Nightmare.name: Triandra
TriandraSunlit Nightmare.title: Sunlit Nightmare
TriandraSunlit Nightmare.description: One of the dökkálfar of Dökkálfheimr. What will the spring festival hold in store for this girl who once lost all hope?

MichalisFruiting Ambition.name: Michalis
MichalisFruiting Ambition.title: Fruiting Ambition
MichalisFruiting Ambition.description: King of Macedon, asked by his sister Maria to take part in the spring festival. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

KarlaSpring Reveries.name: Karla
KarlaSpring Reveries.title: Spring Reveries
KarlaSpring Reveries.description: Karla the swordmaster joined by Freyja, Lady of Nightmare. What could bring these two together at the spring festival? They appear in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade / Heroes.

BernadettaLate Hibernator.name: Bernadetta
BernadettaLate Hibernator.title: Late Hibernator
BernadettaLate Hibernator.description: Daughter of a prominent noble family within the Adrestian Empire. Shy as she is, she is sure to face trials at the spring festival. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

AsheBudding Chivalry.name: Ashe
AsheBudding Chivalry.title: Budding Chivalry
AsheBudding Chivalry.description: Devoted knight in training who wishes to help those in need. He has come to Askr's spring festival full of spirit for the season. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

RobinExalt's Other Half.name: Robin
RobinExalt's Other Half.title: Exalt's Other Half
RobinExalt's Other Half.description: Tactician of Ylisse. Celebrated as Exalt Chrom's other half in the legends that followed their exploits. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

LuciaTireless Advisor.name: Lucia
LuciaTireless Advisor.title: Tireless Advisor
LuciaTireless Advisor.description: Daughter of Count Delbray and master of the blade. She supports Elincia, sharing a bond stronger than that of most siblings. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

GeoffreyRealm's Protector.name: Geoffrey
GeoffreyRealm's Protector.title: Realm's Protector
GeoffreyRealm's Protector.description: Paladin leader of the Royal Knights of Crimea. His loyalty for his homeland and Queen Elincia knows no bounds. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

ElinciaDevoted Queen.name: Elincia
ElinciaDevoted Queen.title: Devoted Queen
ElinciaDevoted Queen.description: Elincia, having overcome hardship. She leads Crimea backed by her conviction and the affection of her people. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

BastianCrimea's Keystone.name: Bastian
BastianCrimea's Keystone.title: Crimea's Keystone
BastianCrimea's Keystone.description: Deputy prime minister of Crimea and trusted ally of the new queen. During the war, he visited many countries to engage them in diplomacy. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

LudveckRebellious Duke.name: Ludveck
LudveckRebellious Duke.title: Rebellious Duke
LudveckRebellious Duke.description: Prominent noble of Crimea's House Felirae, bearing the title of duke. He foments dissent with the goal of forcing Elincia's abdication. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

TakumiTroubled Heart.name: Takumi
TakumiTroubled Heart.title: Troubled Heart
TakumiTroubled Heart.description: Prince of Hoshido, difficult to please as ever. He reluctantly joins the festival after receiving an invitation from his sister Sakura. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

LeoShrouded Heart.name: Leo
LeoShrouded Heart.title: Shrouded Heart
LeoShrouded Heart.description: Prince of Nohr, both confident and proud. He reluctantly joins the festival after receiving an invitation from his sister Elise. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

HanaStriving Heart.name: Hana
HanaStriving Heart.title: Striving Heart
HanaStriving Heart.description: Samurai of Hoshido and retainer to Princess Sakura. She joins the festival to protect the princess she's served since childhood. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

EliseSweetheart Royals.name: Elise
EliseSweetheart Royals.title: Sweetheart Royals
EliseSweetheart Royals.description: Princess Elise of Nohr and Princess Sakura of Hoshido, arriving at the Day of Devotion wearing their brightest smiles. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

EffieDedicated Heart.name: Effie
EffieDedicated Heart.title: Dedicated Heart
EffieDedicated Heart.description: Armor-covered knight of Nohr and retainer to Princess Elise. She joins the festival to protect her close friend whom she serves. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

GotohWhite Sage.name: Gotoh
GotohWhite Sage.title: White Sage
GotohWhite Sage.description: Legendary figure who granted gifts to humanity across the age, including the Khadein school of magic. Also known as the White Sage. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

FomortiisDemon King.name: Fomortiis
FomortiisDemon King.title: Demon King
FomortiisDemon King.description: The Demon King who once threatened all of Magvel before being defeated by five heroes and sealed in the Sacred Stones. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

LumeraDragon Monarch.name: Lumera
LumeraDragon Monarch.title: Dragon Monarch
LumeraDragon Monarch.description: Divine Dragon Monarch, ruler of the holy land of Lythos. She is Alear's mother and the hero who once saved all of Elyos. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

C\u00e9lineJoyous Royal.name: Céline
C\u00e9lineJoyous Royal.title: Joyous Royal
C\u00e9lineJoyous Royal.description: Princess of Firene and Alfred's younger sister. She has a gentle demeanor and a particular love for tea. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Chlo\u00e9Fairy-Tale Flier.name: Chloé
Chlo\u00e9Fairy-Tale Flier.title: Fairy-Tale Flier
Chlo\u00e9Fairy-Tale Flier.description: Royal knight of Firene and retainer to Princess Céline. Descended from a noble line, she also loves fairy tales and folk food. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

AlearDragon Child.name: Alear
AlearDragon Child.title: Dragon Child
AlearDragon Child.description: Successor to the Divine Dragon, awoken from a long sleep. Summons Emblems to lead the world to peace. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

AlfredFloral Protector.name: Alfred
AlfredFloral Protector.title: Floral Protector
AlfredFloral Protector.description: Crown prince of Firene, a peace-loving land. He trains constantly with the intent of improving his constitution. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

EtieFitness Fighter.name: Etie
EtieFitness Fighter.title: Fitness Fighter
EtieFitness Fighter.description: Royal knight of Firene and retainer to Prince Alfred. She is a noble lady who seeks out any opportunity to continually build her muscle. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

LindeBound by Fate.name: Linde
LindeBound by Fate.title: Bound by Fate
LindeBound by Fate.description: Linde, dressed in the robes of the Khadein school of magic, joined by Sara. They bond over the tragedy in their pasts. They appear in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem / Thracia 776.

UrsulaRoyal-Blue Crow.name: Ursula
UrsulaRoyal-Blue Crow.title: Royal-Blue Crow
UrsulaRoyal-Blue Crow.description: Ursula, dressed in the robes of the Khadein school of magic. Also known as the Blue Crow of the Black Fang assassins. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

SorenWind of Tradition.name: Soren
SorenWind of Tradition.title: Wind of Tradition
SorenWind of Tradition.description: Soren, dressed in the robes of the Khadein school of magic, struggling to hide his confusion over the garb's significance. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

NinoSpirited Sorcerer.name: Nino
NinoSpirited Sorcerer.title: Spirited Sorcerer
NinoSpirited Sorcerer.description: Nino, dressed in the robes of the Khadein school of magic, bursting with excitement over the chance to attend a school for her first time. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

BylethFount of Learning.name: Byleth
BylethFount of Learning.title: Fount of Learning
BylethFount of Learning.description: Byleth, dressed in the robes of the Khadein school of magic, with plans to demonstrate the teaching methods of Garreg Mach. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

AshEarnest Greetings.name: Ash
AshEarnest Greetings.title: Earnest Greetings
AshEarnest Greetings.description: Retainer to Askr. She welcomes the new year with gratitude.

YarneHoppy New Year.name: Yarne
YarneHoppy New Year.title: Hoppy New Year
YarneHoppy New Year.description: One of the taguel, who can transform into rabbits. Excited to hear about the large role rabbits play in this year's festivities. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

PanneWelcoming Dawn.name: Panne
PanneWelcoming Dawn.title: Welcoming Dawn
PanneWelcoming Dawn.description: One of the taguel, who can transform into rabbits, celebrating in New Year's garb. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

ElmResolute Grouch.name: Elm
ElmResolute Grouch.title: Resolute Grouch
ElmResolute Grouch.description: Retainer to Embla. Has roused himself enough to take a passing interest in the festivities.

AskrRenewed Gods.name: Askr
AskrRenewed Gods.title: Renewed Gods
AskrRenewed Gods.description: The gods Askr, of the opened kingdom, and Embla, of the closed kingdom. They have arrived together to ring in the new year.

ShezSharpest Blades.name: Shez
ShezSharpest Blades.title: Sharpest Blades
ShezSharpest Blades.description: Mercenary that throws herself into the battles of Fódlan. Defeated countless foes and led many allies to victory. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

DorotheaYuletide Dancer.name: Dorothea
DorotheaYuletide Dancer.title: Yuletide Dancer
DorotheaYuletide Dancer.description: This charmer has done everything from trodding the boards to studying with the Black Eagles. Here, she will liven up the festival. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

CordeliaUnyielding Snow.name: Cordelia
CordeliaUnyielding Snow.title: Unyielding Snow
CordeliaUnyielding Snow.description: Cordelia of Ylisse and Selena of Nohr. The pair has come to bring glad tidings to the festival. They appear in Fire Emblem Awakening / Fates.

BrunoMasked Reveler.name: Bruno
BrunoMasked Reveler.title: Masked Reveler
BrunoMasked Reveler.description: Emblian prince shrouded in mystery. Appears at the Askran winter festival in hopes of ensuring its success.

Black KnightThe Night's Blade.name: Black Knight
Black KnightThe Night's Blade.title: The Night's Blade
Black KnightThe Night's Blade.description: One of Daein's Four Riders. What could have brought him to the festival? None can say. Appears in Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance.

AnnetteFestive Helper.name: Annette
AnnetteFestive Helper.title: Festive Helper
AnnetteFestive Helper.description: A student with the Blue Lions who works twice as hard as anyone. Joins the festival as a good learning experience. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

HansAmbitious Brute.name: Hans
HansAmbitious Brute.title: Ambitious Brute
HansAmbitious Brute.description: A soldier under the direct command of King Garon of Nohr. Known for being merciless. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

Sei\u00f0rGoddess of Hope.name: Seiðr
Sei\u00f0rGoddess of Hope.title: Goddess of Hope
Sei\u00f0rGoddess of Hope.description: Goddess of Vanaheimr, the realm of light. Descends upon the land to save the people from destruction. Always acts with propriety.

CaeldoriPerfect Angel.name: Caeldori
CaeldoriPerfect Angel.title: Perfect Angel
CaeldoriPerfect Angel.description: Strives for perfection, following in the footsteps of the father she admires, Subaki. Naturally talented, beautiful, and motivated. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

OpheliaStarlit Maiden.name: Ophelia
OpheliaStarlit Maiden.title: Starlit Maiden
OpheliaStarlit Maiden.description: Daughter of Odin Dark, mage of Nohr. Received a crystal ball filled with the power of the stars from her father. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

DwyerSleepy Butler.name: Dwyer
DwyerSleepy Butler.title: Sleepy Butler
DwyerSleepy Butler.description: Jakob's son. Supremely apathetic, but has much potential. The coffee he brews is superb. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

KiragiUpbeat Archer.name: Kiragi
KiragiUpbeat Archer.title: Upbeat Archer
KiragiUpbeat Archer.description: Takumi's son. Easygoing and friendly, he always looks for the silver lining. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

VeronicaPrincess Rising.name: Veronica
VeronicaPrincess Rising.title: Princess Rising
VeronicaPrincess Rising.description: Imperial princess of the Emblian Empire. Has come to consider the needs of the people of both Embla and Askr.

EmblaGod of Closure.name: Embla
EmblaGod of Closure.title: God of Closure
EmblaGod of Closure.description: God of the closed kingdom, which shares her name. Spite and jealousy rule her, and she wishes death to any who side with Askr.

MatthisBrother to Lena.name: Matthis
MatthisBrother to Lena.title: Brother to Lena
MatthisBrother to Lena.description: A noble knight of Macedon. Though he would prefer to avoid bloodshed, he had no choice but to take up arms. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

TikiAwakened Blood.name: Tiki
TikiAwakened Blood.title: Awakened Blood
TikiAwakened Blood.description: Divine Dragon princess, entrusted to slumber by the White Sage, Gotoh, reawakened after the restoration of the Binding Shield. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

HardinThe Coyote.name: Hardin
HardinThe Coyote.title: The Coyote
HardinThe Coyote.description: Younger brother of the king of Aurelis, nicknamed the Coyote. Rescued the Archanean Princess, Nyna. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

Gangl\u00f6tDeath Anew.name: Ganglöt
Gangl\u00f6tDeath Anew.title: Death Anew
Gangl\u00f6tDeath Anew.description: Severe, somber servant of the ruler of the dead. She has sworn complete loyalty to Hel.

NynaThe Last Princess.name: Nyna
NynaThe Last Princess.title: The Last Princess
NynaThe Last Princess.description: Princess of the Kingdom of Archanea. After the Dolhr Empire attacked, she escaped to Aurelis and entrusted the Fire Emblem to Prince Marth. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

EliceAltean Princess.name: Elice
EliceAltean Princess.title: Altean Princess
EliceAltean Princess.description: Gentle princess of Altea and Marth's older sister. Noble with a heart that places the lives of those she cares for above her own. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

LaegjarnFlame and Frost.name: Laegjarn
LaegjarnFlame and Frost.title: Flame and Frost
LaegjarnFlame and Frost.description: Princess Laegjarn of Múspell and Princess Fjorm of Nifl, of the Kingdoms of Flame and Ice, unite to participate in the ninja festival.

HeathWyvern Ninja.name: Heath
HeathWyvern Ninja.title: Wyvern Ninja
HeathWyvern Ninja.description: A wyvern rider who once served Bern. Takes to the skies as a ninja on the back of the loyal Hyperion. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

HaarTempest Runner.name: Haar
HaarTempest Runner.title: Tempest Runner
HaarTempest Runner.description: A dracoknight and former Daein soldier. Can he stave off sleepiness long enough to make his mark on the ninja festival? Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

ChercheShaded by Wings.name: Cherche
ChercheShaded by Wings.title: Shaded by Wings
ChercheShaded by Wings.description: Wyvern-riding fighter in Virion's noble house. Hastens to join the ninja festival with her beloved mount, Minerva. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

CamillaMidnight Bloom.name: Camilla
CamillaMidnight Bloom.title: Midnight Bloom
CamillaMidnight Bloom.description: Eldest princess of Nohr whose love for her siblings is second to none, she has joined the ninja festival in a captivating outfit. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

ArvalCycle Keeper.name: Arval
ArvalCycle Keeper.title: Cycle Keeper
ArvalCycle Keeper.description: A mysterious being who exists on the edge of dreams and reality. Fond of offering advice and intent on providing guidance. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

CervantesInvincible General.name: Cervantes
CervantesInvincible General.title: Invincible General
CervantesInvincible General.description: A general backing the Valmese Empire's war effort, having not lost a single battle since deciding to let his whiskers go unshaven. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

GregorSwell Sword.name: Gregor
GregorSwell Sword.title: Swell Sword
GregorSwell Sword.description: A likable merc who has set foot on many distant lands. The years of experience have hardened him, and his age has begun to show. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

EirLife Ascendant.name: Eir
EirLife Ascendant.title: Life Ascendant
EirLife Ascendant.description: Princess of the realm of life, raised in Hel, the realm of the dead, as daughter and heir to its ruler.

RobinFell Tactician.name: Robin
RobinFell Tactician.title: Fell Tactician
RobinFell Tactician.description: A host for the soul of Grima, the Fell Dragon, bent on using her newfound power to sink the world further into despair. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

RickenShepherd Novice.name: Ricken
RickenShepherd Novice.title: Shepherd Novice
RickenShepherd Novice.description: A mage who joined the Shepherds as an apprentice in hopes of learning all he's able from his mentor, Chrom. Young, but a hard worker. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

PhilaPegasus Master.name: Phila
PhilaPegasus Master.title: Pegasus Master
PhilaPegasus Master.description: Leader of Ylisse's pegasus knights. She pours everything she has into training the future generation of pegasus knights. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

DumaStrength and Love.name: Duma
DumaStrength and Love.title: Strength and Love
DumaStrength and Love.description: The God of Strength and Goddess of Love who once divided Valentia between them now join in Askr's harvest festival together. They appear in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

NilsWandering Star.name: Nils
NilsWandering Star.title: Wandering Star
NilsWandering Star.description: A bard whose travels take him between the worlds of dragons and humans, known to vanish as quickly as he is revealed. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

NagaHarvest Divinity.name: Naga
NagaHarvest Divinity.title: Harvest Divinity
NagaHarvest Divinity.description: Ruler of the Divine Dragons descended from on high to visit the harvest-festival revelers. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem and Fire Emblem Awakening.

CorrinStarry Seer.name: Corrin
CorrinStarry Seer.title: Starry Seer
CorrinStarry Seer.description: A woman caught between Nohr and Hoshido who overcame an uncertain destiny. She wants to bring smiles that shine as brightly as the stars in the night sky. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

CorrinCelestial Sorcerer.name: Corrin
CorrinCelestial Sorcerer.title: Celestial Sorcerer
CorrinCelestial Sorcerer.description: A man caught between Nohr and Hoshido who overcame an uncertain destiny. He wants to bring smiles that shine as brightly as the stars in the night sky. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

NinianIce-Dragon Oracle.name: Ninian
NinianIce-Dragon Oracle.title: Ice-Dragon Oracle
NinianIce-Dragon Oracle.description: An ice dragon in human form, who lost her life at the hands of the man she loved. Resurrected, she now lives alongside mortals. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

HolstHero of Leicester.name: Holst
HolstHero of Leicester.title: Hero of Leicester
HolstHero of Leicester.description: Noble of the Leicester Alliance and son of House Goneril. Unmatched in combat, but still prone to doting on his sister, Hilda. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

ShezRising Mercenary.name: Shez
ShezRising Mercenary.title: Rising Mercenary
ShezRising Mercenary.description: A mercenary who wandered Fódlan. Though ordinarily rational, a burning desire sleeps within him. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

MonicaFavored Vassal.name: Monica
MonicaFavored Vassal.title: Favored Vassal
MonicaFavored Vassal.description: Noble of the Adrestian Empire and daughter of Baron Ochs. Endlessly faithful to Edelgard. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

HildaHelping Hand.name: Hilda
HildaHelping Hand.title: Helping Hand
HildaHelping Hand.description: Noble of the Leicester Alliance and daughter of House Goneril. Despite lacking enthusiasm for work, she is willing to lend her aid...sometimes. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

L\u00edfArcane Blade.name: Líf
L\u00edfArcane Blade.title: Arcane Blade
L\u00edfArcane Blade.description: Swordsman of the realm of the dead, now wielding a weapon imbued with magic, having made a contract with the god Thórr.

ShezKeen Mercenary.name: Shez
ShezKeen Mercenary.title: Keen Mercenary
ShezKeen Mercenary.description: A mercenary who wandered Fódlan. Though ordinarily rational, a burning desire sleeps within her. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

TanaSoothing Warmth.name: Tana
TanaSoothing Warmth.title: Soothing Warmth
TanaSoothing Warmth.description: The princess of Frelia and the álfr of sweet dreams, joining hands with one another at the festival of flames. They appear in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones / Heroes.

RinkahConsuming Flame.name: Rinkah
RinkahConsuming Flame.title: Consuming Flame
RinkahConsuming Flame.description: Daughter of the Flame Tribe chieftain, fueled by a white-hot passion for the festival burning deep within her. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

M\u00faspellRaging Inferno.name: Múspell
M\u00faspellRaging Inferno.title: Raging Inferno
M\u00faspellRaging Inferno.description: The god of Múspell, the Kingdom of Flame, has descended upon the festival of flames to put his might on display in the arena of hand-to-hand combat.

MordecaiGentle Firetender.name: Mordecai
MordecaiGentle Firetender.title: Gentle Firetender
MordecaiGentle Firetender.description: A warrior from Gallia who can take the shape of a tiger. He has come to the festival of flames to compete in a contest of raw power. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

LynBlazing Whirlwind.name: Lyn
LynBlazing Whirlwind.title: Blazing Whirlwind
LynBlazing Whirlwind.description: Noblewoman of Caelin whose true name is Lyndis. She joins the festival of flames to represent the Lorca tribe of Sacae. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

DeirdreFated Saint.name: Deirdre
DeirdreFated Saint.title: Fated Saint
DeirdreFated Saint.description: A central figure of the tragedy at Belhalla. Brought three children into the world as dictated by the whims of fate. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

JeraltBlade Breaker.name: Jeralt
JeraltBlade Breaker.title: Blade Breaker
JeraltBlade Breaker.description: Famed former captain of the Knights of Seiros. Moved on to lead a band of mercenaries after the loss of his wife. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

SeliphEnduring Legacy.name: Seliph
SeliphEnduring Legacy.title: Enduring Legacy
SeliphEnduring Legacy.description: Descendant of the crusader Baldr and son of Sigurd. Brings Jugdral's long war to its conclusion. Appears in Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

TikiFated Divinity.name: Tiki
TikiFated Divinity.title: Fated Divinity
TikiFated Divinity.description: A manakete who has lived for thousands of years, through many ages. Worshipped as the Voice of the Divine Dragon by the people of Valm. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

ChromFated Honor.name: Chrom
ChromFated Honor.title: Fated Honor
ChromFated Honor.description: Chrom, exalt of the Halidom of Ylisse. Intent on honoring his sister's dream, he faces his fate with his treasured bonds close at heart. Appears in Fire Emblem Awakening.

BylethSublime Light.name: Byleth
BylethSublime Light.title: Sublime Light
BylethSublime Light.description: A former professor of Garreg Mach Monastery. Guided by the voice of the goddess within, she aims to illuminate the darkness smothering the world. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

SotheRushing Dawn.name: Sothe
SotheRushing Dawn.title: Rushing Dawn
SotheRushing Dawn.description: A thief for the Dawn Brigade wearing a disguise in celebration of masked gentleman thieves. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

LeilaKeen Lookout.name: Leila
LeilaKeen Lookout.title: Keen Lookout
LeilaKeen Lookout.description: A spy in service to House Ostia forgoing her usual attire to join in on the thieving action. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

CathCaper Captain.name: Cath
CathCaper Captain.title: Caper Captain
CathCaper Captain.description: Leader of a group of thieves who steal from the rich. Eager to recruit strong members into her crew. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

RickardCarefree Culprit.name: Rickard
RickardCarefree Culprit.title: Carefree Culprit
RickardCarefree Culprit.description: A thief who looks up to Julian. He is barely able to contain his excitement for thievery, let alone a celebration of it. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

NinaShadowy Figures.name: Nina
NinaShadowy Figures.title: Shadowy Figures
NinaShadowy Figures.description: A former thief and a Hoshidan ninja. Under the cover of night, they glide through the darkness with the silence of shadows. They appear in Fire Emblem Fates.

AskrGod of Openness.name: Askr
AskrGod of Openness.title: God of Openness
AskrGod of Openness.description: God of the opened kingdom, which shares his name. Cheerful and benevolent, he concerns himself with the changes in Embla's heart.

Brigand BossKnown Criminal.name: Brigand Boss
Brigand BossKnown Criminal.title: Known Criminal
Brigand BossKnown Criminal.description: A brigand who set up a hideout in a shrine to the east of Ram Village and acts as the leader of a group of ruffians. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

AtlasForest Muscle.name: Atlas
AtlasForest Muscle.title: Forest Muscle
AtlasForest Muscle.description: A woodcutter from a Zofian mountain village. He accompanies Celica to repay a debt of gratitude he owes her. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

YmirLife-Mother.name: Ymir
YmirLife-Mother.title: Life-Mother
YmirLife-Mother.description: A dragon from the realm of life. Her motherly, compassionate heart laments her realm's destruction at the hands of Hel.

EstSweet Baby Sis.name: Est
EstSweet Baby Sis.title: Sweet Baby Sis
EstSweet Baby Sis.description: The youngest of three pegasus knight sisters. Left the Macedonian Whitewings and now runs her own shop. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

CelicaValentia's Hope.name: Celica
CelicaValentia's Hope.title: Valentia's Hope
CelicaValentia's Hope.description: Princess of Zofia and member of Lima IV's line. She has grown stronger over the course of her journeys with her friends. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

KamuiWandering Blade.name: Kamui
KamuiWandering Blade.title: Wandering Blade
KamuiWandering Blade.description: A mercenary who drifts from place to place. He hates being tied down and models a carefree yet composed attitude. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

NiflTropical Ice God.name: Nifl
NiflTropical Ice God.title: Tropical Ice God
NiflTropical Ice God.description: The dragon of ice and founder of the kingdom that shares her name. How could she possibly enjoy the summer heat?

SethSilver-Sea Knight.name: Seth
SethSilver-Sea Knight.title: Silver-Sea Knight
SethSilver-Sea Knight.description: Young general of Renais who has been assigned to protect Eirika, prepared to accompany her into the water if the situation calls for it. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

EirikaBeach Restorer.name: Eirika
EirikaBeach Restorer.title: Beach Restorer
EirikaBeach Restorer.description: A kind princess who has come from Renais to a tropical island in order to rest and recover her strength. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

Th\u00f3rrSun-Kissed Gods.name: Thórr
Th\u00f3rrSun-Kissed Gods.title: Sun-Kissed Gods
Th\u00f3rrSun-Kissed Gods.description: Loki, whose subtle manipulations touch a wide range of worlds, and Thórr, the war god. What purpose might these two have for coming to the seaside?
